Command.name: Select to Beginning of <Section>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Line" then SendKeys "+{Home}" if ListVar1 = "Paragraph" then SendKeys "^+{Up}" if ListVar1 = "Document" then SendKeys "^+{Home}" End Sub

Command.name: Select to End of <Section>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Line" then SendKeys "+{End}" if ListVar1 = "Paragraph" then SendKeys "^+{Down}" if ListVar1 = "Document" then SendKeys "^+{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Delete to End of <Section>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Line" then SendKeys "+{End}" if ListVar1 = "Paragraph" then SendKeys "^+{Down}" if ListVar1 = "Document" then SendKeys "^+{End}" SendKeys "+{Left}{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Cut <NextOrPrevious> Paragraph
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "^+{Up}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "^+{Down}" if ListVar1 = "Back" then SendKeys "^+{Up}" if ListVar1 = "Forward" then SendKeys "^+{Down}" if ListVar1 = "Last" then SendKeys "^+{Up}" SendKeys "^x" End Sub

Command.name: Cut <NextOrPrevious> <1to20> Paragraphs
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "^+Up "+ListVar2+"" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "^+Down "+ListVar2+"" if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "^+Up "+ListVar2+"" if ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "^+Down "+ListVar2+"" if ListVar1 = "Back" then SendKeys "^+Up "+ListVar2+"" if ListVar1 = "Forward" then SendKeys "^+Down "+ListVar2+"" if ListVar1 = "Last" then SendKeys "^+Up "+ListVar2+"" SendKeys "^x" End Sub

Command.name: Select <NextOrPrevious> <1to50> Cells
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Back" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Forward" then SendKeys "+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Last" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "+{Down "+ListVar2+"}" End Sub

Command.name: Cut <NextOrPrevious> Word
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "^+{Left}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "^+{Right}" if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "^+{Left}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "^+{Right}" if ListVar1 = "Back" then SendKeys "^+{Left}" if ListVar1 = "Forward" then SendKeys "^+{Right}" if ListVar1 = "Last" then SendKeys "^+{Left}" SendKeys "^x" End Sub

Command.name: Cut <NextOrPrevious> <1to20> Words

Command.name: Save JPEG
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" Wait 0.01 AppBringUp "MSPAINT" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%fa" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%tj%s" Wait 1 SendKeys "%y" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.5 TTsPlayString "JPEG saved" Wait 1 SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Delete From Vocabulary
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^x" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "edit","vocabulary" Wait 2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Tab}{Space}%d" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%y" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%c" End Sub

Command.name: Move Window <Direction> <1to50> <Direction> <1to50>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%{Space}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "m" Wait 0.5 if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "{Left "+ ListVar2 + "}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "{Right "+ ListVar2 + "}" if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "{Up "+ ListVar2 + "}" if ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "{Down "+ ListVar2 + "}" Wait 2 if ListVar3 = "Left" then SendKeys "{Left "+ ListVar4 + "}" if ListVar3 = "Right" then SendKeys "{Right "+ ListVar4 + "}" if ListVar3 = "Up" then SendKeys "{Up "+ ListVar4 + "}" if ListVar3 = "Down" then SendKeys "{Down "+ ListVar4 + "}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: <SizeList> Window
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%{Space}s" Wait 0.5 if ListVar1 = "Larger" then SendKeys "{Right 10}{Down 10}" if ListVar1 = "Much Larger" then SendKeys "{Right 25}{Down 25}" if ListVar1 = "Smaller" then SendKeys "{Right}{Left 10}{Down}{Up 10}" if ListVar1 = "Much Smaller" then SendKeys "{Right}{Left 25}{Down}{Up 25}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: <SizeList> Window <1to50>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%{Space}s" Wait 0.5 if ListVar1 = "Lengthen" then SendKeys "{Down}{Down "+ ListVar2 + "}" if ListVar1 = "Widen" then SendKeys "{Right}{Right "+ ListVar2 + "}" if ListVar1 = "Shorten" then SendKeys "{Down}{Up "+ ListVar2 + "}" if ListVar1 = "Taper" then SendKeys "{Right}{Left "+ ListVar2 + "}" if ListVar1 = "Narrow" then SendKeys "{Right}{Left "+ ListVar2 + "}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: <MouseButton_MouseAction>
Command.content: 'Script by Lindsay Adam www.pcbyvoice.com 2011 Private Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, _ ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, _ ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) Sub Main If ListVar1 = "LEFT Mouse Hold Down" then mouse_event (2, 0,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "LEFT Mouse Release" then mouse_event (4, 0,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "RIGHT Mouse Hold Down" then mouse_event (8, 0,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "RIGHT Mouse Release" then mouse_event (16, 0,0,0,0) End Sub

Command.name: Mouse Location
Command.description: Copies the Current Mouse Position To the Clipboard
Command.content:
Option Explicit
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type
' declare Win32 API functions
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long
Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" ()
Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI
Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI
GetCursorPos pt
GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect
result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top
GetWinCurPos = result End Function
Sub Main Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String
hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd)
clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y ' Clipboard clip ' End Sub

Command.name: Cut to <Position>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^x" Wait 0.5 if ListVar1 = "Beginning of Document" then SendKeys "^{Home}^v" if ListVar1 = "End of Document" then SendKeys "{Enter 2}^{End}^v" if ListVar1 = "Beginning of Line" then SendKeys "{Home}^v" if ListVar1 = "End of Line" then SendKeys "{End} ^v" if ListVar1 = "Beginning of Paragraph" then SendKeys "^{Up}^v" if ListVar1 = "End of Paragraph" then SendKeys "^{Down} ^v" End Sub

Command.name: Sound Off
Command.content: Sub Main Shell "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 2 SendKeys "{Tab}{Space}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" GoToSleep End Sub

Command.name: Sound On
Command.content: Sub Main Shell "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 2 SendKeys "{Tab}{Space}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Mute Sound
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "Sound Off" End Sub

Command.name: Start MS Config
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Esc}" Wait 1 SendKeys "msconfig" SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1 SendKeys "+{Tab}{Right 3}{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Start Snipping Tool

Command.name: Strike <1to10>

Command.name: What Day Is It
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 ShellExecute "Wordpad" Wait 1 HeardWord "Todays","Date" Wait 2 SendKeys "+{Home}" Wait 2 HeardWord "set","size","72" Wait 2 HeardWord "read","that" Wait 3 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Play Previous <1to10> Songs
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "switch","to","iTunes" Wait 1 if ListVar1 = "1" then SendKeys "^Left 2" if ListVar1 = "2" then SendKeys "^Left 3" if ListVar1 = "3" then SendKeys "^Left 4" if ListVar1 = "4" then SendKeys "^Left 5" if ListVar1 = "5" then SendKeys "^Left 6" if ListVar1 = "6" then SendKeys "^Left 7" if ListVar1 = "7" then SendKeys "^Left 8" if ListVar1 = "8" then SendKeys "^Left 9" if ListVar1 = "9" then SendKeys "^Left 10" if ListVar1 = "10" then SendKeys "^Left 11" Wait 1 SendKeys "%{Space}n" End Sub

Command.name: Play Next <1to10> Songs
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "switch","to","iTunes" Wait 1 if ListVar1 = "1" then SendKeys "{Right}" if ListVar1 = "2" then SendKeys "{Right 2}" if ListVar1 = "3" then SendKeys "{Right 3}" if ListVar1 = "4" then SendKeys "{Right 4}" if ListVar1 = "5" then SendKeys "{Right 5}" if ListVar1 = "6" then SendKeys "{Right 6}" if ListVar1 = "7" then SendKeys "{Right 7}" if ListVar1 = "8" then SendKeys "{Right 8}" if ListVar1 = "9" then SendKeys "{Right 9}" if ListVar1 = "10" then SendKeys "[Right 10}" Wait 1 SendKeys "%{Space}n" End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> Title <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "+{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" End Sub

Command.name: DISPLAY <1to4> <window position>

Command.name: Quote Back
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys"^c" SendKeys"{""}" SendKeys"^v" SendKeys"{""}" Wait .5 SendKeys"^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: System Information
Command.content: '#Reference #Microsoft.VisualBasic, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Reference #System.Management, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Language "WWB.NET" 'Example script by RWilke Imports System.Management Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices Function GetCPUInfo() As String Dim strCPUInfo As String = String.Empty() Dim query As New SelectQuery( "Win32_Processor" ) Dim search As New ManagementObjectSearcher( query ) Dim info As ManagementObject For Each info In search.Get() strCPUInfo += "CPU:" + vbTab + vbTab + info( "Name" ) + vbCrLf strCPUInfo += "Cores / Threads:" + vbTab + info( "NumberOfCores" ) + " / " + info( "NumberOfLogicalProcessors" ) + vbCrLf strCPUInfo += "Cache:" + vbTab + vbTab + info( "L2CacheSize" ) + " KB L2 / " + info( "L3CacheSize" ) + " KB L3" + vbCrLf Next Return strCPUInfo End Function Function GetComputerInfo() As String Dim computerInfo As New Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Computer Dim strComputerInfo As String = String.Empty() Dim lTotalMem As Long = computerInfo.Info.TotalPhysicalMemory / (1024*1024) Dim lAvailableMem As Long = computerInfo.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory / (1024*1024) strComputerInfo += "Physical Memory:" + vbTab + lTotalMem.ToString() + " GB Total" _ + " / " + lAvailableMem.ToString() + " GB Available" + " / " _ + (Round(100-(100/lTotalMem*lAvailableMem))).ToString()+ " % Used" + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "Operating System:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSFullName + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Platform:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSPlatform + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Version:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSVersion + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Language:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.InstalledUICulture.ToString() + vbCrLf Return strComputerInfo End Function Sub Main Dim s As String = String.Empty() s += GetCPUInfo() s += GetComputerInfo() s += vbCrLf + vbCrLf + "Click Yes to save to a file, click No to quit" + vbCrLf If MsgBox( s, vbYesNo ) = vbYes Then Dim saveFileDialog As New Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog() saveFileDialog.Filter = "txt files (*.txt)|*.txt" saveFileDialog.ShowDialog() End If End Sub

Command.name: Find Mouse Position
Command.content:
Option Explicit
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type
' declare Win32 API functions
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long
Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" ()
Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI
Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI
GetCursorPos pt
GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect
result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top
GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String
hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd)
clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y clip = clip & Chr(13) & Chr(10) & _ "Wait .5" & Chr(13) & Chr(10) & _ "ButtonClick 1,1" & Chr(13) & Chr(10) ' Clipboard clip ' TTSPlayString "mouse position is ready to be pasted" End Sub

Command.name: Restart Windows
Command.content: Sub Main TTSPlayString "restart windows?" If MsgBox("Windows will now be restarted, before clicking Ok you should make " _ + "sure that all necessary files are saved and the Dragon user profile is " _ + "saved if required", vbOkCancel ) = vbOk Then ShellExecute "shutdown.exe -r -t 00 -f" End If End Sub

Command.name: Zoom <In_Out>
Command.content: 'Script copyright Rüdiger Wilke, RW Programs 2015 Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long Const VK_CTRL = 17 Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800 Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Select Case ListVar1 Case "In" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA, 0) Case "Out" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA, 0) End Select keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) End Sub

If MsgBox("Call Number", vbYesNo ) = vbYes Then
End If SendKeys "^w" Wait .3 EmulateRecognition "Call Number" End Sub

If ListVar1="Dee" then param1 = "D." If ListVar1="E." then param1 = "E." If ListVar1="F." then param1 = "F." If ListVar1="gee" then param1 = "G." If ListVar1="H." then param1 = "H." If ListVar1="I" then param1 = "I." If ListVar1="Jay" then param1 = "J." If ListVar1="Kay" then param1 = "K." If ListVar1="L." then param1 = "L." If ListVar1="M." then param1 = "M." If ListVar1="N." then param1 = "N." If ListVar1="oh" then param1 = "O." If ListVar1="pee" then param1 = "P." If ListVar1="cue" then param1 = "Q." If ListVar1="are" then param1 = "R." If ListVar1="S." then param1 = "S." If ListVar1="tea" then param1 = "T." If ListVar1="you" then param1 = "U." If ListVar1="V." then param1 = "V." If ListVar1="W." then param1 = "W." If ListVar1="X." then param1 = "X." If ListVar1="why" then param1 = "Y." If ListVar1="Z." then param1 = "Z." SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}+{Enter 2}" + param1 HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: KnowBrainer Login
Command.content:
'#Reference {EAB22AC0-30C1-11CF-A7EB-0000C05BAE0B}#1.1#0#C:\Windows\SysWOW64\ieframe.dll#Microsoft Internet Controls#SHDocVw '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\PROGRA~2\Nuance\NATURA~1\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools 'Script Lindsay Adam pcbyvoice 2015 www.pcbyvoice.com Const READYSTATE_COMPLETE = 4 ' Declare Internet Explorer object Dim IE As SHDocVw.InternetExplorer Sub Main MsgBox "The first time you run this command you will see this message box. After the command completes you will likely get a message that your login credentials are invalid. Please open the command and change the username and password on lines 27 and 28. Then remove line 6 which is this message." ' create instance of InternetExplorer Set IE = New InternetExplorer ' using your newly created instance of Internet Explorer With IE .Visible = True .Navigate2 "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/index.cfm" ' Wait until page we are navigating to is loaded Do While .Busy Loop Do Loop Until .ReadyState = READYSTATE_COMPLETE ' the username and password values will not exist if already logged in ' so no need to fill in the values and go straight to Next On Error Resume Next If Err Then 'Do Nothing Else ' When the page is fully loaded enter your username and password ' you will need to set these appropriately With .Document.forms("login" ) .FTVAR_USERNAMEFRM.value = "TYPE YOUR USER NAME HERE" .FTVAR_PASSWORDFRM.value = "TYPE YOUR PASSWORD HERE" .submit End With ' Wait until fully logged in Do While .Busy Loop End If
'.Navigate2 "https://caaware.dor.ca.gov/aware5/VR/Landing.aspx#=y"
End With ' Tidy Up Set IE = Nothing End Sub

Command.name: What is My IP Address
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 OpenWebsite "http://dynupdate.no-ip.com/ip.php" End Sub

Command.name: Dictation Box
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "show dictation box" End Sub

Command.name: Code Emulate Recognition <dictation>
Command.description: If you say Code Heard Word “move to end of line” you can simultaneously combine a HeardWord script with any text, such as the name of command.
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{End}~" SendKeys "EmulateRecognition {""}{""}{Left}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Tomorrows Date
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys Format(Now+1, "MMMM d, yyyy" ) End Sub

Command.name: Gmail To <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main ShellExecute "https://mail.google.com/mail/" Wait 5 HeardWord "click","compose" Wait 1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 1 HeardWord "\caps-on" End Sub

Command.name: Code Loop
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{End}{Enter}For i = 1 To~" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "Next{Up}{End} " End Sub

Command.name: Code Loop <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{End}{Enter}For i = 1 To " + CStr(ListVar1) + "~" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "Next{Up}{End} " End Sub

Command.name: Search <folder> For <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "switch to Outlook" Wait 2 SendKeys "^y" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Home}" If ListVar1 = "Deleted Items" Then SendKeys "de" If ListVar1 = "Drafts" Then SendKeys "dr" If ListVar1 = "Junk E-mail" Then SendKeys "ju" If ListVar1 = "Out Box" Then SendKeys "ou" If ListVar1 = "In Box" Then SendKeys "in" If ListVar1 = "Sent Items" Then SendKeys "se" If ListVar1 = "RSS Feeds" Then SendKeys "rs" If ListVar1 = "Spam" Then SendKeys "spa" SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Home}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^e" Wait .1 SendKeys "^a{Del}" Wait .5 SendKeys ListVar2 Wait .5 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 2 SendKeys "+{Tab 2}" End Sub

Command.name: Search <folders> for <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "switch to Outlook" Wait 2 If ListVar1 = "Calendar" Then SendKeys "^2" If ListVar1 = "Notes" Then SendKeys "^5" If ListVar1 = "Tasks" Then SendKeys "^4" If ListVar1 = "Journal" Then SendKeys "^8" If ListVar1 = "Contacts" Then SendKeys "^3" If ListVar1 = "Folder List" Then SendKeys "^6" If ListVar1 = "Shortcuts" Then SendKeys "^7" If ListVar1 = "Mail" Then SendKeys "^1" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^e" Wait .1 SendKeys "^a{Del}" Wait .5 SendKeys ListVar2 Wait .5 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 2 SendKeys "+{Tab 2}" End Sub

Command.name: Code SendKeys Alternate <ica_complex>
Command.content: Sub Main ' what you can say from the list is: ' any phonetic alphabet letter, alpha to zulu ' any normal letter a to z ' any number 1 to 9 param1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) SendKeys "{End}{Enter}SendKeys ""{%}" + param1 + """ SendKeys "{Left}" End Sub

Command.name: New Application Command
Command.description: Creates a new command for the application your cursor is in
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Application Command" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" End Sub

Command.name: New <Command> Mouse Command
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "Mouse","Location" Wait 1 HeardWord "add","command" Wait 4 if ListVar1 = "Global" then SendKeys "" if ListVar1 = "Application" then SendKeys "%a" if ListVar1 = "Window" then SendKeys "%f" SendKeys "%y{End}%r" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Enter}Wait .5{Enter}ButtonClick" Wait 1 SendKeys "%c" Wait 0.2 HeardWord "\caps-on" End Sub

Command.name: Bookmark <10to50>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "["+ListVar1+"]" End Sub

Command.name: Bookmark <1to10>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "1" Then SendKeys "[01]" If ListVar1 = "2" Then SendKeys "[02]" If ListVar1 = "3" Then SendKeys "[03]" If ListVar1 = "4" Then SendKeys "[04]" If ListVar1 = "5" Then SendKeys "[05]" If ListVar1 = "6" Then SendKeys "[06]" If ListVar1 = "7" Then SendKeys "[07]" If ListVar1 = "8" Then SendKeys "[08]" If ListVar1 = "9" Then SendKeys "[09]" End Sub

Command.name: E-mail <email>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "switch to Outlook" Wait 2 SendKeys "^+m" Wait 0.5 If ListVar1 = "Lunis" Then SendKeys "Lunis@KnowBrainer.com" If ListVar1 = "Lunis Orcutt" Then SendKeys "Lunis@KnowBrainer.com" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer" Then SendKeys "Support@KnowBrainer.com" If ListVar1 = "no-brainer" Then SendKeys "Sales@KnowBrainer.com" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%u" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" End Sub

Command.name: Search Evernote For <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "switch to Evernote" Wait 3 SendKeys "{F6}" Wait .1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait .5 SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Search OneNote For <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "switch to OneNote" Wait 3 SendKeys "^e" Wait .1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Space Insert <dictation>
Command.description: Use "Insert fill in the blank" to force dictation into any field you can type in
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Space}" End Sub

Command.name: Space Bookmark <1to10>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 0.1 If ListVar1 = "1" Then SendKeys "[01]" If ListVar1 = "2" Then SendKeys "[02]" If ListVar1 = "3" Then SendKeys "[03]" If ListVar1 = "4" Then SendKeys "[04]" If ListVar1 = "5" Then SendKeys "[05]" If ListVar1 = "6" Then SendKeys "[06]" If ListVar1 = "7" Then SendKeys "[07]" If ListVar1 = "8" Then SendKeys "[08]" If ListVar1 = "9" Then SendKeys "[09]" End Sub

Command.name: Space Bookmark <10to50>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "["+ListVar1+"]" End Sub

Command.name: Space Change To <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: New App Command <dictation>
Command.description: Build and name a new command
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Application Command" Wait 0.5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" End Sub

Command.name: New App Listing Command <dictation>
Command.description: Creates a new command for the application your cursor is in
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Application Command" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" Wait .5 SendKeys "%l" End Sub

Command.name: New Application Command <dictation>
Command.description: Build and name a new command
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Application Command" Wait 0.5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" End Sub

Command.name: New Command <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Global Command" Wait 0.5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" End Sub

Command.name: New Dragon Scripting Command <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgNewCommandWizard, 0, , 0) Wait 1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%y" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{End}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%r" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Backspace 2}" End Sub

Command.name: New Global Command <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Global Command" Wait 0.5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" End Sub

Command.name: New Global Listing Command <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Global Command" Wait 0.5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%l" End Sub

Command.name: New Listing Command <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Global Command" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" Wait .5 SendKeys "%l" End Sub

Command.name: New Text Command <dictation>
Command.description: Copies highlighted boilerplate text into a new Dragon command
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "add","command" Wait 2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Backspace}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%l" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: New Window Command <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Window Command" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" End Sub

Command.name: New Window Listing Command <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Window Command" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" Wait .5 SendKeys "%l" End Sub

Command.name: New <1to300> Command <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "Add","Application","Command" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "DisplayNumbersAndClick " Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%n" Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar2 Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Code SendKeys Windows <ica_complex> Out
Command.content: Sub Main ' what you can say from the list is: ' any phonetic alphabet letter, alpha to zulu ' any normal letter a to z ' any number 1 to 9 param1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) SendKeys "{End}{Enter}SendKeys ""{{}" SendKeys "WindowsHold" SendKeys "}" SendKeys "" + param1 + """ Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Code SendKeys Windows <ica_complex>
Command.content: Sub Main ' what you can say from the list is: ' any phonetic alphabet letter, alpha to zulu ' any normal letter a to z ' any number 1 to 9 param1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) SendKeys "{End}{Enter}SendKeys ""{{}" SendKeys "WindowsHold" SendKeys "}" SendKeys "" + param1 + """ SendKeys "{Left}" End Sub

Command.name: Code Windows <ica_complex>
Command.content: Sub Main ' what you can say from the list is: ' any phonetic alphabet letter, alpha to zulu ' any normal letter a to z ' any number 1 to 9 param1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) SendKeys "{{}" SendKeys "WindowsHold" SendKeys "}" SendKeys "" + param1 + "" End Sub

Command.name: Code Windows <ica_complex> Out
Command.content: Sub Main ' what you can say from the list is: ' any phonetic alphabet letter, alpha to zulu ' any normal letter a to z ' any number 1 to 9 param1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) SendKeys "{{}" SendKeys "WindowsHold" SendKeys "}" SendKeys "" + param1 + "" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Make That <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "delete that" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Change That To <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "delete that" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Set All <FontFace> <FontSize>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Times" then param1 = "Times New Roman" if ListVar1 = "Courier" then param1 = "Courier New" if ListVar1 = "Arial" then param1 = "Arial" if ListVar1 = "Comic" then param1 = "Comic Sans MS" if ListVar1 = "Impact" then param1 = "Impact" if ListVar1 = "Garamond" then param1 = "Garamond" if ListVar1 = "Kaufmann" then param1 = "Kaufmann BT" if ListVar1 = "Monotype" then param1 = "Monotype Corsiva" if ListVar3 = "Plain" then param3 = "Regular" if ListVar3 = "Plain text" then param3 = "Regular" if ListVar3 = "Underline" then param3 = "%u" if ListVar3 = "Italics" then param3 = "Italic" if ListVar3 = "Bold" then param3 = "bold" SendKeys "^a%of%f" + param1 + "%s" + ListVar2 + "~{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Undo <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "^z" Next Wait 0.5 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> Title
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "+{Tab}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "{Tab}" if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "{Up}" if ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "{Down}" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" End Sub

Command.name: Title That
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{End}+{Home}" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\all-caps","that" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^e" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Enter 2}^l" End Sub

Command.name: Redo <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "^y" Next Wait 0.5 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: Line <1to100> Times
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "_" Next SendKeys " " End Sub

Command.name: Resume With <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Home}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^h" Wait 0.5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Right}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^+{End}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Say <Language> Translation for <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 If ListVar1 = "Afrikaans" Then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|af|" If ListVar1 = "Albanian" Then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|sq|" If ListVar1 = "Arabic" Then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|ar|" If ListVar1 = "Belarusian" Then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|be|" If ListVar1 = "Bulgarian" Then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|bg|" If ListVar1 = "Catalan" Then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|ca|" If ListVar1 = "Chinese Simplifed" Then ShellExecute "http://translate.google.com/#auto|zh-CN|" If ListVar1 = "Chinese Traditional" Then ShellExecute Command.name: New App Mouse Command <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools ' Script by Lindsay Adam, PCByVoice Ltd, www.pcbyvoice.com 2015 ' from an idea by Lunis Orcutt, KnowBrainer ' Please note there is no error handling and you may have to adjust the wait times ' at the end of the script when using SendKeys command
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type ' declare Win32 API functions Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" () Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl GetCursorPos pt GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main
Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd) clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y
' Now complete the KnowBrainer command editor ' you may have to adjust the wait times below
'EmulateRecognition "New Application Command" HeardWord "New", "Application", "Command" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.2 SendKeys clip Wait 0.2 SendKeys "~Wait 0.1~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "ButtonClick 1,1" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Save In <FolderList>
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 SendKeys "{F12}" Wait .4 If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer" Then SendKeys "C:\Program Files (x86)\Knowbrainer\KB Professional 14\" Wait .5 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1 SendKeys "%s" Wait 1 TTSPlayString "file saved" Wait 2 SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 ShellExecute "http://www.google.com/" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait .5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Lowercase <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking14\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim engCtrl As New DgnEngineControl engCtrl.Register engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("select " & ListVar1) engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("\no-caps that") Wait .5 engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("go back") engCtrl.UnRegister(False) End Sub

Command.name: New Mouse Command <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools ' Script by Lindsay Adam, PCByVoice Ltd, www.pcbyvoice.com 2015 ' from an idea by Lunis Orcutt, KnowBrainer ' Please note there is no error handling and you may have to adjust the wait times ' at the end of the script when using SendKeys command
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type ' declare Win32 API functions Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" () Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl GetCursorPos pt GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main
Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd) clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y
' Now complete the KnowBrainer command editor ' you may have to adjust the wait times below
'EmulateRecognition "New Application Command" HeardWord "Add","Application","Command" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.2 SendKeys clip Wait 0.2 SendKeys "~Wait 0.1~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "ButtonClick 1,1" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Sample Change <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Home}" Wait .5 SendKeys "^h" Wait .1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait .2 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Add To Vocabulary
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "add","word" Wait 2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%a" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}" Wait 0.2 HeardWord "save","user","profile" Wait 5 SendKeys "%{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Wheel <Direction> <1to20>
Command.content: Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800 'Courtesy of Mike Jerry Sub Main Select Case ListVar1 Case "Up" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Down" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Right" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Left" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) End Select End Sub

Command.name: Code <Direction> <dictation>
Command.description: Move in any direction, force dictation and press the spacebar
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Tab" Then SendKeys "{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Shift Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up}" SendKeys ListVar2 End Sub

Command.name: Code <Direction> <1to20> <dictation>
Command.description: Move in any direction 1 to 20 times, force dictation and press the spacebar
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Tab" Then SendKeys "{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Shift Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" SendKeys ListVar3 End Sub

Command.name: Code Back <dictation>

Command.name: <Direction> Insert <dictation>
Command.description: Move in any direction, force dictation and press the spacebar
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Tab" Then SendKeys "{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Shift Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up}" SendKeys ListVar2 End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> <1to20> Insert <dictation>
Command.description: Move in any direction 1 to 20 times, force dictation and press the spacebar
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Tab" Then SendKeys "{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Shift Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" SendKeys ListVar3 End Sub

Command.name: Paste Line
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End}+{Enter}^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "+{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Paste Paragraph
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End}+{Enter 2}^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "+{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> <1to1000> Words
Command.content: Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys"^{Left 50}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys"^{Right 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "^{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "^{Right "+ListVar2+"}" End If End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> <1to1000> Paragraphs
Command.content: Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys"^{Up 50}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys"^{Down 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "^{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "^{Down "+ListVar2+"}" End If End Sub

Command.name: Volume Down <1to100>
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Down "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 1 TTSPlayString "sound check" End Sub

Command.name: Volume Up <1to100>
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Up "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 1 TTSPlayString "sound check" End Sub

Command.name: Volume Level <1to100>

Command.name: Close Without Saving <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch to ACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Act" Then HeardWord "switch to ACT" If ListVar1 = "AOL" Then HeardWord "switch to AOL" If ListVar1 = "Dialer" Then HeardWord "switch to Dialer" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "switch to DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch to Excel" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch to Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Free Cell" Then HeardWord "switch to FREE CELL" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch to FRONT Page" If ListVar1 = "Groove" Then HeardWord "switch to GROOVE" If ListVar1 = "Info Path" Then HeardWord "switch to INFO PATH" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then HeardWord "switch to Internet Explorer" If ListVar1 = "iTunes" Then HeardWord "switch to iTunes" If ListVar1 = "Microsoft Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "switch to Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch to One Note" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch to Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to paint" If ListVar1 = "Photo House" Then HeardWord "switch to Photo House" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch to Power Point" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch to Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Snag It" Then HeardWord "switch to SnagIt" If ListVar1 = "Sound Recorder" Then HeardWord "switch to sound recorder" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch to WordPerfect" If ListVar1 = "Write" Then HeardWord "switch to Write" Wait 1.5 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%n" End Sub

Command.name: Go To Desktop <0to9>
Command.description: Allows You to Switch From the 1st to 9th Virtual Desktop (courtesy of Daryl Davis)
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Left 9}", True If (ListVar1 <> "1" ) Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right " & CStr(CInt(ListVar1)-1) & "}", True End Sub

Command.name: Start <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.1 If ListVar1 = "Access" Then ShellExecute "MSACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Auto Transcribe" Then HeardWord "Open","AutoTranscribe","Folder","Agent" If ListVar1 = "Calculator" Then ShellExecute "Calc" If ListVar1 = "Clock" Then ShellExecute "ms-clock:" If ListVar1 = "Computer" Then HeardWord "open","computer" If ListVar1 = "Defender" Then HeardWord "open","Windows","Defender" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "open","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Evernote" Then ShellExecute "Evernote" If ListVar1 = "Edge" Then HeardWord "open","Microsoft","Edge" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then ShellExecute "EXCEL" If ListVar1 = "Explorer" Then ShellExecute "Explorer" If ListVar1 = "File Explorer" Then ShellExecute "Explorer" If ListVar1 = "Windows Explorer" Then ShellExecute "Explorer" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then ShellExecute "Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then ShellExecute "FRONTPG" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then ShellExecute "CHROME" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then ShellExecute "IEXPLORE" If ListVar1 = "iTunes" Then AppBringUp "C:\Program Files\iTunes\iTunes.exe" If ListVar1 = "Malwarebytes" Then ShellExecute "mbam" If ListVar1 = "NaturallySpeaking" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then ShellExecute "Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then ShellExecute "Onenote" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then ShellExecute "Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then ShellExecute "MSPAINT" If ListVar1 = "PowerPoint" Then ShellExecute "PowerPNT" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then ShellExecute "MSPUB" If ListVar1 = "QuickBooks" Then ShellExecute "QBW32" If ListVar1 = "Run" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}r" If ListVar1 = "Sound" Then ShellExecute "SndVol" If ListVar1 = "System Properties" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Pause}" If ListVar1 = "Task Manager" Then SendKeys "^+{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then ShellExecute "Winword" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then ShellExecute "Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then ShellExecute "wpwin18" End Sub

Command.name: Select Everything
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{End}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^+{Home}" End Sub

Command.name: Delete Everything
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{End}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^+{Home}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Say <dictation>
Command.description: Used to force dictation into any field you can type in and adds a extra space after your dication
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys " " End Sub

Command.name: Delete All
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Underline
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^u" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Italicize
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^i" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Numbers Mode
Command.content: HeardWord "numbers","mode","on" Wait 3000 HeardWord "numbers","mode","off"

Command.name: Spell Mode
Command.content: HeardWord "spell","mode","on" Wait 3000 HeardWord "spell","mode","off"

Command.name: Command Mode
Command.content: HeardWord "command","mode","on" Wait 3000 HeardWord "command","mode","off"

Command.name: Dictation Mode
Command.content: HeardWord "dictation","mode","on" Wait 3000 HeardWord "normal","mode","on"

Command.name: Minimize <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch to ACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Act" Then HeardWord "switch to ACT" If ListVar1 = "AOL" Then HeardWord "switch to AOL" If ListVar1 = "Dragonpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Dragonpad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch to Excel" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch to Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch to FRONT Page" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then HeardWord "switch to Google Chrome" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then HeardWord "switch to Internet Explorer" If ListVar1 = "iTunes" Then HeardWord "switch to iTunes" If ListVar1 = "Microsoft Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "switch to Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch to One Note" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch to Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to paint" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch to Power Point" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch to Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Snag It" Then HeardWord "switch to SnagIt Editor" If ListVar1 = "Sound Recorder" Then HeardWord "switch to sound recorder" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch to WordPerfect" If ListVar1 = "Write" Then HeardWord "switch to Write" Wait 1.5 SendKeys "%{Space}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "n" End Sub

Command.name: Maximize <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch to ACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Act" Then HeardWord "switch to ACT" If ListVar1 = "AOL" Then HeardWord "switch to AOL" If ListVar1 = "Dragonpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Dragonpad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch to Excel" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch to Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch to FRONT Page" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then HeardWord "switch to Google Chrome" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then HeardWord "switch to Internet Explorer" If ListVar1 = "iTunes" Then HeardWord "switch to iTunes" If ListVar1 = "Microsoft Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "switch to Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch to One Note" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch to Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to paint" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch to Power Point" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch to Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Snag It" Then HeardWord "switch to SnagIt Editor" If ListVar1 = "Sound Recorder" Then HeardWord "switch to sound recorder" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch to WordPerfect" If ListVar1 = "Write" Then HeardWord "switch to Write" Wait 1 SendKeys "%{Space}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "x" End Sub

Command.name: Restore <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch to ACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Act" Then HeardWord "switch to ACT" If ListVar1 = "AOL" Then HeardWord "switch to AOL" If ListVar1 = "Dragonpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Dragonpad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch to Excel" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch to Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch to FRONT Page" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then HeardWord "switch to Google Chrome" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then HeardWord "switch to Internet Explorer" If ListVar1 = "iTunes" Then HeardWord "switch to iTunes" If ListVar1 = "Microsoft Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "switch to Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch to One Note" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch to Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to paint" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch to Power Point" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch to Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Snag It" Then HeardWord "switch to SnagIt Editor" If ListVar1 = "Sound Recorder" Then HeardWord "switch to sound recorder" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch to WordPerfect" If ListVar1 = "Write" Then HeardWord "switch to Write" Wait 1 SendKeys "%{Space}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "r" End Sub

Command.name: Copy To Beginning
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^+{Home}" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: New Blank Command <dictation>
Command.description: Build and name a new block command
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Application Command" Wait 0.5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "SendKeys {""}{""}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Title Case <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking14\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim engCtrl As New DgnEngineControl engCtrl.Register engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("select " & ListVar1) engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("\cap that") Wait .5 engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("go back") engCtrl.UnRegister(False) End Sub

Command.name: Uppercase <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking14\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim engCtrl As New DgnEngineControl engCtrl.Register engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("select " & ListVar1) engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("\all-caps that") Wait .5 engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("go back") engCtrl.UnRegister(False) End Sub

Command.name: <Format> Back
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Uppercase" Then HeardWord "\all-caps","that" If ListVar1 = "Lowercase" Then HeardWord "\no-caps","that" If ListVar1 = "Title Case" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Capitalize" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Title" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Italicize" Then SendKeys "^i" If ListVar1 = "Italics" Then SendKeys "^i" If ListVar1 = "Underline" Then SendKeys "^u" If ListVar1 = "Bold" Then SendKeys "^b" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: <Format> All
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.5 if ListVar1 = "Uppercase" then HeardWord "\all-caps","that" if ListVar1 = "Lowercase" then HeardWord "\no-caps","that" if ListVar1 = "Title Case" then HeardWord "\cap","that" if ListVar1 = "Title" then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Capitalize" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" if ListVar1 = "Italicize" then SendKeys "^i" if ListVar1 = "Italics" then SendKeys "^i" if ListVar1 = "Underline" then SendKeys "^u" if ListVar1 = "Bold" then SendKeys "^b" If ListVar1 = "Strikethrough" Then HeardWord "strikethrough","that" Wait .5 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: <Format>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Uppercase" Then HeardWord "\all-caps","that" If ListVar1 = "Lowercase" Then HeardWord "\no-caps","that" If ListVar1 = "Title Case" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Title" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Capitalize" Then HeardWord "\cap","that" If ListVar1 = "Italicize" Then SendKeys "^i" If ListVar1 = "Italics" Then SendKeys "^i" If ListVar1 = "Underline" Then SendKeys "^u" If ListVar1 = "Bold" Then SendKeys "^b" If ListVar1 = "Strikethrough" Then HeardWord "strikethrough","that" End Sub

Command.name: Double Bullet
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "+{Enter 2}• " Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: Go To <dictation>
Command.description: Example: say "Go to KnowBrainer"
Command.content: Sub Main ShellExecute "https://duckduckgo.com/" Wait 2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "~" Wait 3 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Double List <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "+{Enter 2}"+ListVar1+". " HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: Search <web>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 If ListVar1 = "Ask" Then ShellExecute "http://www.ask.com/?o=0&l=dir" If ListVar1 = "Bing" Then ShellExecute "http://www.bing.com/" If ListVar1 = "Duck Duck" Then ShellExecute "https://duckduckgo.com/" If ListVar1 = "Duck Duck Go" Then ShellExecute "https://duckduckgo.com/" If ListVar1 = "eBay" Then ShellExecute "http://www.ebay.com/" If ListVar1 = "Google" Then ShellExecute "http://www.google.com/" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer" Then ShellExecute "http://shop.knowbrainer.com/store/pc/search.asp" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer Forum" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If ListVar1 = "Nuance Knowledgebase" Then ShellExecute "http://nuance.custhelp.com/" If ListVar1 = "Quick Tips" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/index.cfm/wiki/knowbrainer-quick-tips/" If ListVar1 = "Wikipedia" Then ShellExecute "http://wikipedia.org/" If ListVar1 = "Yahoo" Then ShellExecute "http://www.yahoo.com/" If ListVar1 = "You Tube" Then ShellExecute "https://www.youtube.com/" If ListVar1 = "Dictionary" Then ShellExecute "http://dictionary.reference.com/" If ListVar1 = "Thesaurus" Then ShellExecute "http://www.thesaurus.com/" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Search <web> for <dictation>

Command.name: New Dragon Command <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgNewCommandWizard, 0, , 0) Wait 1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%l" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: New Dragon Text Command <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgNewCommandWizard, 0, , 0) Wait 1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%l" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Go To <website>
Command.content: Sub Main website = ListVar1 Wait 0.01 If website = "KnowBrainer Forum" Then ShellExecute "http://knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/index.cfm" If website = "Home Page" Then SendKeys "%vgh" If website = "Home Shopping Club" Then ShellExecute "www.css.isn.com/" If website = "KnowBrainer" Then ShellExecute "www.knowbrainer.com/" If website = "no-brainer" Then ShellExecute "www.knowbrainer.com/" If website = "Microsoft" Then ShellExecute "www.microsoft.com/" If website = "eBay" Then ShellExecute "www.ebay.com/" If website = "QVC" Then ShellExecute "www.qvc.com/" If website = "Amazon" Then ShellExecute "http://www.amazon.com" If website = "see net" Then ShellExecute "www.search.com/" If website = "Yahoo" Then ShellExecute "www.yahoo.com/" If website = "Map Quest" Then ShellExecute "www.mapquest.com/" End Sub

Command.name: Build A Command <dictation>
Command.description: Copies highlighted boilerplate text into a new Dragon command
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait .3 HeardWord "add","command" Wait 2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%l" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Calculate <dictation>
Command.description: Thanks to Mike Jerry for this command
Command.content:
Sub Main
Dim operator As String Dim firstnum As String Dim secondnum As String Dim result As String
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "+") Then operator = "Plus" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "+") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "-") Then operator = "Minus" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "-") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "×") Then operator = "Times" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "×") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "÷") Then operator = "Divided By" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "÷") End If
ShellExecute "Calc" Wait 1 'Separate out the numbers firstnum = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 1) secondnum = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 1, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 1) 'Strip out any commas from the numbers 'cuz Calculator don't like 'em firstnum = Replace$(firstnum, ",", "") secondnum = Replace$(secondnum, ",", "") SendKeys firstnum Wait 0.1 If operator = "Plus" Then SendKeys "{+}" If operator = "Minus" Then SendKeys "-" If operator = "Divided By" Then SendKeys "/" If operator = "Times" Then SendKeys "{*}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys secondnum Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.2 'Now to format the result to limit decimal places to two digits and add commas every three digits to large numbers result = Clipboard 'If both decimal and integer > 3 If InStr(CStr(result), ".") And Len(CStr(result)) > 3 Then result = Format( result , "#,0.##" ) GoTo Finish End If 'If decimal only If InStr(CStr(result), ".") Then result = Format( result , "#.##" ) GoTo Finish End If 'If integer > 3 only If Len(CStr(result)) > 3 Then result = Format( result , "#,0" ) End If Finish:
SendKeys result
End Sub

Command.name: Enter Date <dayexpressions>
Command.content: Sub Main Dim stringFormat As String Dim stringDate As String stringFormat="dd/mm/yyyy" Select Case ListVar1 Case "Today" stringDate= Format (Date(), stringFormat) Case "Tomorrow" stringDate= Format (Date()+1,stringFormat) Case "Yesterday" stringDate= Format (Date()-1,stringFormat) Case "Day after Tomorrow" stringDate= Format (Date()+2,stringFormat) Case "Day before Yesterday" stringDate= Format (Date()-2,stringFormat) Case "Next Week" stringDate= Format (Date()+7,stringFormat) Case "Last Week" stringDate= Format (Date()-7,stringFormat) Case "Last Saturday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Sat" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Sunday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Sun" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Monday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Mon" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Tuesday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Tue" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Wednesday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Wed" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Thursday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Thu" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Friday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Fri" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Sunday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Sun" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Saturday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Sat" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Monday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Mon" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Tuesday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Tue" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Wednesday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Wed" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Thursday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Thu" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Friday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Fri" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next End Select SendKeys stringDate End Sub

Command.name: Enter Multiple Items
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim strResult As String Dim k As Integer Dim strInsert As String Dim sString(2) As String sString(0)="Down"
sString(1)="Up" sString(2)="Tab" Dim Action(2) As String Action(0)="Enter"
Action(1)="Up" Action(2)="TAB" Begin Dialog UserDialog 400,252," Enter Repeating Value ",.DialogFunc ' %GRID:10,7,1,1 ' left, top, weight, height Text 20,14,220,14," What value do you wish to enter:",.Text1 TextBox 20,35,370,21,.TextBox1 Text 20,70,220,14," How Many Times:",.Text2 TextBox 20,90,370,21,.TextBox2 Text 30,119,220,14,"Direction:",.Text3 ListBox 20,140,370,56,sString(),.listva1,2 CheckBox 20,203,100,14,"Increment",.CheckBoxIncrement OKButton 70,224,90,21 CancelButton 220,224,90,21 End Dialog Dim dlg As UserDialog dlg.listva1=0
result = Dialog (dlg)
If result = -1 Then ' If the user clicked OK, ' MsgBox "Your name is " + dlg.TextBox1
Dim longValue As Long Dim DateValue As Date Dim stringDataType As String If IsDate(dlg.TextBox1) Then stringDataType="Date" DateValue=CDate (dlg.TextBox1) ElseIf IsNumeric(dlg.TextBox1) Then stringDataType="Numeric" longValue=CLng(dlg.TextBox1) Else stringDataType="Text" End If
' MsgBox sString(dlg.lista1) Dim l As Integer For l = 1 To Val (dlg.TextBox2) If dlg.CheckboxIncrement Then Select Case stringDataType Case "Date" If l>1 Then DateValue= DateValue +1 SendKeys DateValue & "{" & Action(dlg.listva1) & "}" Case "Numeric" If l>1 Then longValue= longValue+1 SendKeys longValue & "{" & Action(dlg.listva1) & "}" End Select Else SendKeys(dlg.TextBox1 & "{" & Action(dlg.listva1) & "}") End If Next End If End Sub
Function DialogFunc%(DlgItem$, Action%, SuppValue%)
Select Case Action% Case 5 DlgFocus("TextBox1") End Select
End Function

Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "+{Down "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" End Sub

Command.name: <increment_decrement> Date
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 Dim dateToChange As Date Dim stringValue As String stringValue= Clipboard If Len(stringValue)= 0 Then Exit Sub dateToChange=CDate(stringValue) If Not IsDate(dateToChange) Then Exit Sub If ListVar1="Increment" Then dateToChange= dateToChange +1 Else dateToChange= dateToChange -1 End If stringValue= Format(dateToChange,"dd/mm/yyyy") ' Clipboard stringValue SendKeys stringValue End Sub

if t2 = "space" Then t2 = " " if t3 = "space" Then t3 = " " if t4 = "space" Then t4 = " " if t5 = "space" Then t5 = " " if t6 = "space" Then t6 = " " if t7 = "space" Then t7 = " " if t8 = "space" Then t8 = " " if t9 = "space" Then t9 = " " 'if tA = "space" Then tA = " " 'if tB = "space" Then tB = " " 'if tC = "space" Then tC = " " 'if tD="space" Then tD=" " Select Case ListVar1 Case "Lower","Letters" SendKeys t2+t3+t4+t5+t6+t7+t8+t9 Case "Upper" SendKeys UCase(t2+t3+t4+t5+t6+t7+t8+t9) Case "Mixed","Title" SendKeys UCase (t2) +t3+t4+t5+t6+t7+t8+t9 end select End Sub

Command.name: Running Processes
Command.content:
'#Reference #System.Windows.Forms, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Language "WWB.NET" Imports System.Diagnostics 'Access the Process namespace Sub Main Dim sProcesses() As Process Dim sProcess As Process Dim s, p As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler Dim search as String search=InputBox("Enter a search value","Search for a Process","dgn")
' Get all running system processes sProcesses = System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses() s = "" s = vbCrLf & "Procss Names currently running: " & vbCrLf & vbCRLf For Each sProcess In sProcesses ' compose a string with all the process names separated commas If sProcess.ProcessName.Contains(search) Then s = s + sProcess.ProcessName() & ", " End If Next ' Display all the processes currently running in a MessageBox MsgBox s ErrorHandler:: ' deal with error here if required End Sub

Command.name: Display List
Command.description: testing display a list
Command.content:
'#Reference #System.Windows.Forms, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Language "WWB.NET" Imports System.Windows.Forms
Sub Main Dim lists(3) lists(0) = "A List 0" lists(1) = "B List 1" lists(2) = "C List 2" lists(3) = "E List 3" Begin Dialog UserDialog 200,120 Text 10,10,180,15,"Please push the OK button" ListBox 10,25,180,60,lists(),.list OKButton 80,90,40,20 End Dialog Dim dlg As UserDialog dlg.list = 2 Dialog dlg ' show dialog (wait for ok) MessageBox.Show("Selected " & dlg.list) Debug.Print dlg.list End Sub

Command.name: Click Mouse Position <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" ' Option Explicit Private Type cursorinformation x As Integer y As Integer End Type Dim cursorinformation As cursorinformation Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Function SetMousePositionW(integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer) SetCursorPos CLng(integerLeft), CLng(integerTop)
End Function
Sub Main()
Dim stringSQLText As String
Dim namedLocation as String namedLocation=ListVar1 GetSavedMousePosition namedLocation ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, "X: " & cursorinformation.x & " Y: " & cursorinformation.y
SetMousePositionW cursorinformation.x, cursorinformation.y ButtonClick 1,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) End Sub Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Function GetSavedMousePosition(namedLocation as String) Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim stringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer stringSQLText = "SELECT [Saved Mouse Position].NamedLocation" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [Saved Mouse Position].X" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [Saved Mouse Position].Y" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM [Saved Mouse Position]" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE ((([Saved Mouse Position].NamedLocation)='" & namedLocation & "'))" stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ORDER BY [Saved Mouse Position].Created Desc" Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst cursorinformation.x = Recordset![x] cursorinformation.y = Recordset![y] End If Recordset.Close
End Function

Command.name: Google Translate That
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim stringApplication As String Dim stringCommandLine As String SendKeys "^c" Dim stringValue As String On Error Resume Next stringValue= Clipboard If Err.Number<>0 Then Exit Sub If Len(stringValue)= 0 Then Exit Sub stringValue= Trim (stringValue) stringValue=Replace(stringValue," ","%20") stringApplication="""C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe""" stringCommandLine="https://translate.google.co.uk/#en/fr/" & stringValue Shell stringApplication & " " & stringCommandLine, 3
End Sub

Command.name: Fake Email
Command.content:
Sub Main
Dim LRandomNumber As Integer Randomize Dim Word As String Dim integerCounter As Integer For integerCounter = 1 To 10 LRandomNumber = Int((97 - 122 + 1) * Rnd + 122) Word = Word & Chr(LRandomNumber) Next Word = Word & "@gmail.com" SendKeys Word,True
End Sub

Command.name: Refresh Taskbar
Command.content:
'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Sub Main Dim counter As Integer Dim startPosition As Integer startPosition= 1000 For counter=startPosition To 1620 Step 20 SetMousePositionW 0, counter , 1030 Wait 0.1 Next End Sub Function SetMousePositionW(integerRelative As Integer, integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer)
SetCursorPos(CLng(integerLeft),CLng(integerTop))
End Function

Command.name: Windows Start <dictation>
Command.description: launch any application using the start menu
Command.content: Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for Escape and Control keys Const VK_CTRL = &H11 Const VK_ESC = &H1B Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) keybd_event(VK_ESC,0,0,0) keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) keybd_event(VK_ESC,0,2,0) Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 + "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Mouse <Direction> <1to5000> Click
Command.description: Mouse Up, Down, Left or Right 1 to 1000 pixels
Command.content: Sub Main offset = Val( ListVar2) if ListVar1 = "Up" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -offset if ListVar1 = "Down" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, offset if ListVar1 = "Left" then SetMousePosition 2, -offset, 0 if ListVar1 = "Right" then SetMousePosition 2, offset, 0 ButtonClick 1,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) End Sub

Command.name: Find Text <dictation>
Command.description: Used to perform a search on an open document. Example, say "Find Bob Jones"
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Home}" Wait .5 SendKeys "^h" Wait .1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait .2 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Change <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Change <dog> With <cat> to replace the last occurrence of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "to") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 3, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^+{Up}" 'Selects previous paragraph Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies the selection to the clipboard for processing Wait 1.5 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the end of the current paragraph End End Sub

Command.name: Change All <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Replace <dog> With <cat> to replace the last occurrence of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "to") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 3, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^a" 'Selects everything Wait 1 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies everything to the clipboard for processing Wait 2 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the end of the document End End Sub

Command.name: Go Delete <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Del}" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Duplicate Line Above
Command.content: Sub Main Dim stringValue as String stringValue=Clipboard SendKeys "{Up}" SendKeys "{Home}" SendKeys "+{End}" SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Down}" SendKeys "{Home}" SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 Clipboard(stringValue) End Sub

Command.name: <myalphabet> <myalphabet> <myalphabet> <myalphabet> <myalphabet>
Command.content: Sub Main t2 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) t3 = Mid$(ListVar2,1,InStr(ListVar2, "\")-1) t4 = Mid$(ListVar3,1,InStr(ListVar3, "\")-1) t5 = Mid$(ListVar4,1,InStr(ListVar4, "\")-1) t6 = Mid$(ListVar5,1,InStr(ListVar5, "\")-1) if t2 = "backslash" Then t2 = "\" if t3 = "backslash" Then t3 = "\" if t4 = "backslash" Then t4 = "\" if t5 = "backslash" Then t5 = "\" if t6 = "backslash" Then t6 = "\" if t2 = "space" Then t2 = " " if t3 = "space" Then t3 = " " if t4 = "space" Then t4 = " " if t5 = "space" Then t5 = " " if t6 = "space" Then t6 = " " SendKeys UCase(t2+t3+t4+t5+t6) End Sub

Command.name: Multi <actions> <actions> <actions>
Command.content:
Sub Main
' <>-<> 1st keystroke pos = InStr (_arg1,"\") key$ = Mid$ (_arg1, 0, pos-1) SendKeys key$
' <>-<> 2nd keystroke pos = InStr (_arg2,"\") key$ = Mid$ (_arg2, 0, pos-1) SendKeys key$
' <>-<> 3rd keystroke pos = InStr (_arg3,"\") key$ = Mid$ (_arg3, 0, pos-1) SendKeys key$
End Sub

Command.name: Convert to KnowBrainer
Command.content:
Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 Dim value as String value=Clipboard value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(0)","ListVar1") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(1)","ListVar2") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(2)","ListVar3") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(3)","ListVar4") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(4)","ListVar5") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(5)","ListVar6") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (0)","ListVar1") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (1)","ListVar2") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (2)","ListVar3") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (3)","ListVar4") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (4)","ListVar5") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (5)","ListVar6") value= Replace(value,"SendDragonKeys","SendKeys") value= Replace(value,"SendSystemKeys","SendKeys") value= Replace(value,"'#Uses""C:\Users\Mark\Documents\ASGF.txt""","'#Uses""C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt""") value= Replace(value,"'#Uses ""C:\Users\Mark\Documents\ASGF.txt""","'#Uses""C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt""") Wait 0.1
Clipboard(value) SendKeys "^v"
End Sub

'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Sub Main Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String Dim intClipboardNumber As Integer Dim strCategory As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler If ListVar1="1" Then intClipboardNumber=1 Else value=Val(ListVar1) intClipboardNumber= value End If If intClipboardNumber<10 Then SendKeys "+%^" & ListVar1 & "" End If
ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: ' Clipboard strClipboardValue ' SendKeys strClipboardValue MsgBox Err.Description,," An Error Has Occurred " & Err.Number Resume ExitHere
End Sub

Command.name: <leftrightmiddle> Mouse <DirUpDown>
Command.content:
Private Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, _ ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, _ ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long)
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type
'
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10
Sub Main
Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long
GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates
xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y)
If ListVar2 = "Up" Then
Select Case ListVar1 Case "Left" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Right" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Center", "Middle" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End Select Else Select Case ListVar1 Case "Left" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Right" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Center", "Middle" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End Select
End If
End Sub

Command.name: <keyname_2> Hold Down
Command.content:
' Script Lindsay Adam 2010 www.pcbyvoice.com ' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the left Windows key, ' control key, shift key and alt key Const VK_LWIN = &h5B Const VK_CTRL = &h11 Const VK_SHIFT = &h10 Const VK_ALT = &h12
Sub Main If ListVar1 = "WINDOWS Key" Then keybd_event(VK_LWIN,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "CONTROL Key" Then keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "SHIFT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SHIFT,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "ALT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_ALT,0,0,0) End Sub

' Script Lindsay Adam 2010 www.pcbyvoice.com ' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the left Windows key, ' control key, shift key and alt key Const VK_LWIN = &h5B Const VK_CTRL = &h11 Const VK_SHIFT = &h10 Const VK_ALT = &h12
Sub Main If ListVar1 = "WINDOWS Key" Then keybd_event(VK_LWIN,0,2,0) If ListVar1 = "CONTROL Key" Then keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) If ListVar1 = "SHIFT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SHIFT,0,2,0) If ListVar1 = "ALT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_ALT,0,2,0) End Sub
