Command.name: Save Mouse Position <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Private Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type Private Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Sub Main() Dim cursorInformation As POINTAPI ' Get the current mouse cursor coordinates: Call GetCursorPos(cursorInformation) ' Print out current position on the form: ' Print "Current X = " & rect.x ' Print "Current Y = " & rect.y Dim stringSQLText As String Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open
stringSQLText="INSERT INTO [dbo].[SavedMousePosition]" _ & "([NamedLocation],[X],[Y])" _ & " VALUES ('" & ListVar1 &"' ," & cursorInformation.x & " , " & cursorInformation.y & ")"
Connection.Execute stringSQLText Dim stringTemporary As String stringTemporary="longTop=" & cursorInformation.y & " : longLeft=" & cursorInformation.x Clipboard(stringTemporary)
End Sub Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function

Command.name: Save Mouse Position
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Private Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type Private Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Sub Main() Dim cursorInformation As POINTAPI ' Get the current mouse cursor coordinates: Call GetCursorPos(cursorInformation) ' Print out current position on the form: ' Print "Current X = " & rect.x ' Print "Current Y = " & rect.y Dim stringSQLText As String Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open
stringSQLText = "UPDATE [SavedMousePosition] SET [SavedMousePosition].NamedLocation = 'Default'" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].X = " & cursorInformation.x & "" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].Y = " & cursorInformation.y & ";" Connection.Execute stringSQLText Dim stringTemporary As String stringTemporary="longTop=" & cursorInformation.y & " : longLeft=" & cursorInformation.x Clipboard(stringTemporary)
End Sub Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function

Command.name: Multiple Launcher
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" 'Good <time> Dragon Option Explicit Dim ml_List(100) As String Sub Main Dim result As String Dim strGreeting As String
GetArrayOfMultipleLauncher ' ExecuteScript "SetRecognitionMode 2",0 ' CommandModeOn Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl result = EngineControl.PromptValue(ml_List(), "what do you want to do today", 1400, 700) ' ExecuteScript "SetRecognitionMode 0",0 ' NormalModeOn If result="Quit Menu" Then End ' TTSPlayString "Okay" LaunchMultipleApplications(result) End
End Sub Function GetArrayOfMultipleLauncher() Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim k As Integer Dim strSQLText As String strSQLText = "SELECT MultipleLauncher.id" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " , MultipleLauncher.Description" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM MultipleLauncher;" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 ml_List(k)= Recordset.Fields("Description") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close k= k +1 ml_List(k)="Quit Menu" End Function Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function Function LaunchMultipleApplications(strDescription As String) Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim StringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer Dim result As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler StringSQLText = "SELECT Launcher.CommandLine" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Launcher.Name" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM (LauncherMultipleLauncherBridge " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN MultipleLauncher " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON LauncherMultipleLauncherBridge.MultipleLauncherID = MultipleLauncher.ID) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN Launcher " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON LauncherMultipleLauncherBridge.LauncherID = Launcher.ID" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE (((MultipleLauncher.Description)='" & strDescription & "'))" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ORDER BY Launcher.Name;"
Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Dim strCommandLine As String Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 'AppBringUp rs.Fields("Name"),rs.Fields("CommandLine") strCommandLine= Recordset.Fields("CommandLine") strCommandLine= Replace(strCommandLine,Chr(34),"") result= Recordset.Fields("Name") Select Case Right(strCommandLine,3) Case "mdb", "mda", "mdw" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\OFFICE14\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "cdb","cda" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\OFFICE14\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "rtf", "doc", "dot" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\OFFICE14\winword.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine) Case "exe","EXE" Shell Recordset.Fields("CommandLine"),vbNormalFocus Case Else If InStr(strCommandLine,"dotnet")>0 Then Shell strCommandLine,vbMinimizedNoFocus ElseIf InStr(strCommandLine,"http") = 0 Then ShellExecute strCommandLine,vbMinimizedNoFocus Else ShellExecute strCommandLine,vbMinimizedNoFocus ' AppBringUp result,strCommandLine End If
End Select
'Display an instruction in DragonBar ' MsgBox result, vbInformation, strCommandLine ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, "Opening: " & Recordset.Fields("CommandLine") Dim dummy As String ' dummy=InputBox("this is a pause " & Recordset!Commandline) Wait 1 Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing
End ErrorHandler:
Select Case Err.Number ' Case 1
Case Else MsgBox "The following un handled error has occurred:" & vbCr & Recordset.Fields("CommandLine") & vbCr & Err.Description, vbCritical+vbOkOnly+vbDefaultButton1 _ , "An Error Has Occurred" End Select End Function

Command.name: <NextOrPrevious> <1to20> Words
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "^+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Following" then SendKeys "^+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "^+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Back" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Forward" then SendKeys "^+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Last" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" End Sub

Command.name: <Mouse_Button> <DirUpDown>
Command.content:
Private Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, _ ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, _ ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long)
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type
'
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10
Sub Main
Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long
GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates
xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y)
If ListVar2 = "Up" Then if ListVar1="Mouse" Or ListVar1="Left" Then mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI elseIF ListVar1="Right" THEN mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI else mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End If Else if ListVar1="Mouse" Or ListVar1="Left" Then mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI elseIF ListVar1="Right" THEN mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI else mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End If End If
End Sub

'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Private Type POINTAPI X As Long Y As Long End Type
Private Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long
Sub Main Dim longTop As Long Dim intLeft As Long
Select Case ListVar2 Case "Zero" intLeft=5 Case "Alpha" intLeft= 50 Case "Bravo" intLeft= 100 Case "Charlie" intLeft= 150 Case "Delta" intLeft= 200 Case "Echo" intLeft= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intLeft= 300 Case "Golf" intLeft= 350 Case "Hotel" intLeft= 400 Case "India" intLeft= 450 Case "Juliet" intLeft= 500 Case "Kilo" intLeft= 550 Case "Lima" intLeft= 600 Case "Mike" intLeft= 650 Case "November" intLeft= 700 Case "Oscar" intLeft= 750 Case "Papa" intLeft= 800 Case "Qubec" intLeft= 850 Case "Romeo" intLeft= 900 Case "Sierra" intLeft= 950 Case "Tango" intLeft= 1000 Case "Uniform" intLeft= 1050 Case "Victor" intLeft= 1100 Case "Whiskey" intLeft= 1150 Case "X-ray" intLeft= 1200 Case "Yankee" intLeft= 1250 Case "Zulu" intLeft= 1300 Case "One","1" intLeft= 1350 Case "Two","2","to" intLeft= 1400 Case "Three","3" intLeft= 1450 Case "Four","4","for" intLeft= 1500 Case "Five","5" intLeft= 1550 Case "Six","6" intLeft= 1600 Case "Seven","7" intLeft= 1650 End Select Select Case ListVar1 Case "Card" longTop= 940 Case "Taskbar","Taskbar Right" longTop= 1030 Case "Title bar" longTop= 15 Case "Ribbon","Menu" longTop= 85 Case "Tab line","Document Heading" longTop= 197 Case "Horizontal Scrollbar" longTop= 987 Case "Tab Page Line" longTop= 240 Case "Menu Right" longTop= 90 intLeft= intLeft+ 1700 Case "Left LightSwitch" longTop= 977 End Select Dim SmallIncrement As Integer If ListVar3="1" or ListVar3="One" Then SmallIncrement=1 Else SmallIncrement=CInt(ListVar3 ) End If intLeft=intLeft + (SmallIncrement*5) ' SetMousePosition 0,LongLeft, longTop SetMousePositionW(0, CLng (intLeft) , longTop) ' HeardWord "mouse","left","click" If ListVar1="Taskbar Right" Then ButtonClick 2,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) Else ButtonClick 1,1 End If ' SetMousePositionW(0, CLng (intLeft+1) , longTop+1) End Sub Function SetMousePositionW(integerRelative As Integer, integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer)
SetCursorPos(CLng(integerLeft),CLng(integerTop))
End Function

Command.name: <ProgrammingWordType> <dictation>
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim stringValue As String Dim stringResult As String Dim integerCounter As Integer Dim variantArray() As Variant stringValue= Trim (ListVar2) variantArray = ConvertDelimitedToArray(" ", stringValue) Dim stringDelimiter As String If InStr(ListVar1,"Dot Notation")>0 Then stringDelimiter="." ElseIf InStr(ListVar1,"Hyphen")>0 Then stringDelimiter="-" ElseIf InStr(ListVar1,"Words" )>0 Then stringDelimiter=" " Else stringDelimiter="" End If For integerCounter = 0 To UBound(variantArray) -1 If integerCounter=0 Then If ListVar1="Variable" Or InStr(ListVar1,"Words")>0 OR ListVar1="Dot Notation" Then stringResult= UCase(Mid(variantArray(integerCounter), 1,1)) & LCase(Mid(variantArray(integerCounter), 2)) Else ' Camel case or lower is now implied stringResult= LCase(variantArray(integerCounter)) End If Else If InStr(ListVar1,"Camel" )>0 Or InStr(ListVar1,"Words")>0 Or InStr(ListVar1,"Variable" ) >0 Or ListVar1="Dot Notation" Then stringResult= stringResult & stringDelimiter & UCase(Mid(variantArray(integerCounter), 1,1)) & LCase(Mid(variantArray(integerCounter), 2)) Else stringResult= stringResult & stringDelimiter & LCase(Mid(variantArray(integerCounter), 1,1)) & LCase(Mid(variantArray(integerCounter), 2)) End If End If Next SendKeys stringResult
End Sub
Public Function ConvertDelimitedToArray(strDelimiter As String _ , strValue As String) As Variant Dim intDelimiters As Integer 'Added 14/10/2005 Dim strTemp As String Dim intPosn As Integer Dim k As Integer Dim varArray() As Variant 'ReDim Preserve X(10, 10, 15) 'Count number of delimiters intDelimiters = 0 For k = 1 To Len(strValue) If Mid(strValue, k, Len(strDelimiter)) = strDelimiter Then intDelimiters = intDelimiters + 1 End If Next intDelimiters = intDelimiters + 1 ReDim varArray(intDelimiters) As Variant If intDelimiters=1 Then varArray(0)= strValue Else k = -1 If Len(strValue & "") > 0 And InStr(strValue, strDelimiter) > 0 Then strTemp = strValue Do Until InStr(strTemp, strDelimiter) = 0 intPosn = InStr(strTemp, strDelimiter) k = k + 1
varArray(k) = Left(strTemp, intPosn - 1) strTemp = Mid(strTemp, intPosn + Len(strDelimiter)) Loop varArray(k + 1) = strTemp
End If End If ConvertDelimitedToArray = varArray End Function

Command.name: <logins> Login
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" 'Option Explicit Sub Main On Error GoTo ErrorHandler Dim stringValue As String Dim stringUsername As String Dim stringPassword As String Dim stringLogin as String stringLogin= ListVar1 GetValuestoInsert stringLogin, stringUsername, stringPassword SendKeys stringUsername, True SendKeys "{TAB}", True Wait 0.1 SendKeys stringPassword, True
ExitHere: End ErrorHandler: MsgBox Err.Description,,"IntelliSense script; An Error Has Occurred " & Err.Number Resume ExitHere End Sub
Public Sub GetValuestoInsert(stringLookup As String, stringUsername As String, stringPassword As String) Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim stringSQLText As String stringSQLText = "SELECT [Username],[Password] " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM dbo.[Logins] " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE (((dbo.[Logins].Name)='" & stringLookup & "'));" Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst stringUsername = Recordset![Username] stringPassword= Recordset![Password] End If Recordset.Close End Sub
Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function

Command.name: <enter> <lookupvalue>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Sub Main On Error GoTo ErrorHandler 'strDB_Filename="C:\Launch Applications\Data\LaunchApplications.accdb" 'If FileExists(strDB_Filename) Then 'do absolutely nothing 'Else ' MsgBox "This script expects to have an Access Database called and located as follows: " & strDB_Filename ,vbCritical,"ABORTING!" ' End 'End If Dim stringValue As String stringValue= GetValuetoInsert(ListVar2 )
SendKeys stringValue, True
ExitHere: End
ErrorHandler: MsgBox Err.Description,,"IntelliSense script; An Error Has Occurred " & Err.Number Resume ExitHere
End Sub
Public Function GetValuetoInsert(stringLookup As String) As String Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim stringSQLText As String stringSQLText = "SELECT dbo.[ValuestoInsert].[ValueToInsert] " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM dbo.[ValuestoInsert] " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE (((dbo.[ValuestoInsert].Lookup)='" & stringLookup & "'));" Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst GetValuetoInsert = Recordset![ValuetoInsert] End If Recordset.Close Connection.Close Set Recordset= Nothing Set Connection= Nothing End Function Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function

Command.name: <categories> <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Dim catList(100) As String Dim IntelliSenseList(100) As String Dim Remarks As Variant Sub Main Dim strLanguage As String Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler ' MsgBox atCNames(0), vbOkOnly, "Computer Name?" ' If UtilityProvider.IsDebugMode Then ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(0,"IntelliSense") ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(1,"Text Blocks") ' End If Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString = GetConnectionString()' "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=USER-HP;Initial Catalog=MyDatabase;Integrated Security=SSPI;" Connection.Open
strLanguage= "Not Applicable" Dim stringCategory As String stringCategory=ListVar1 If strLanguage="IntelliSense" Then strLanguage="Not Applicable" If strLanguage="C#" Then strLanguage="C Sharp" ' result = EngineControl.PromptValue(IntelliSenseList(), "choose your item", 1400, 700) result=ListVar2 If result="," then result="Colour" If LCase (result) ="edit list" Then strCommandLine="C:\Msoffice\Access\DragonScripts.accdb" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) & " /cmd " & Chr(34) & strLanguage & "|" & stringCategory & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing Exit Sub End If If result="Quit Menu" Then Exit Sub Dim strSendKeysValue As String Dim stringDeliveryType As String strSendKeysValue=GetSendKeys_Value(result, strLanguage, stringCategory, stringDeliveryType, Connection) Dim stringClipboardBackup As String stringClipboardBackup= Clipboard Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing
' MsgBox strSendKeysValue If Len(Remarks & "")>0 Then 'SendDragonKeys "'" & Remarks & vbCr & strSendKeysValue ' DragonMsg Remarks ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, Remarks End If ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage showmessageNone, "Starting Send Keys Process" Select Case stringDeliveryType Case "Copy and Paste" Clipboard strSendKeysValue Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 Clipboard stringClipboardBackup Case "Send Keys","Send Dragon Keys","Send System Keys" strSendKeysValue=Replace(strSendKeysValue,"(","{(}") strSendKeysValue=Replace(strSendKeysValue,")","{)}")
If InStr(strSendKeysValue,Chr(13)) = 0 Then If Len(strSendKeysValue)> 100 Then SendKeys Left (strSendKeysValue, 100), True Wait 0.1 SendKeys Mid(strSendKeysValue, 101), True Else SendKeys strSendKeysValue, True End If Else SendKeysWithCRLF strSendKeysValue End If Case "Execute as Script" ' VoiceCommand.ExecuteScript strSendKeysValue,0 MacroRunThis strSendKeysValue Case "Clipboard Only" Clipboard strSendKeysValue End Select ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage showmessageNoBeep , "Finished Send Keys Process" ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: If Err.Number= 521 Or Err.Number= 10140 Then ' I believe this is can't access the clipboard Resume Next End If MsgBox Err.Number & " " & Err.Description,,"IntelliSense script; An Error Has Occurred " Resume ExitHere End Sub
Function GetIntelliSenseArray(strCategory As String, strLanguage As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim stringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer stringSQLText = "SELECT CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , Computers.ComputerName" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM (Languages " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID) " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " LEFT JOIN Computers " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON CustomIntelliSense.ComputerID = Computers.ID" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE (((Languages.Language)='" & strLanguage & "') " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " AND ((Categories.Category)='" & strCategory & "') " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " AND ((Computers.ComputerName)='" & atCNames(0) & "' Or (Computers.ComputerName) Is Null))" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;"
Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst Erase IntelliSenseList() End If Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 IntelliSenseList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Display_Value") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing IntelliSenseList(k+1)="Edit List" IntelliSenseList(k+2)="Quit Menu" End Function
Function GetArrayOfCategory(strLanguage As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String On Error GoTo GetArrayOfCategory_Error Dim k As Integer Dim strSQLText As String strSQLText = "SELECT DISTINCT Categories.*" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Languages " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Categories.Category_Type)='IntelliSense Command') " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " AND ((Languages.Language)='" & strLanguage & "'))" strSQLText = strSQLText & " ORDER BY Categories.Category;" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 catList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Category")
Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing k= k +1 catList(k)="Quit Menu" ExitHere: Exit Function
GetArrayOfCategory_Error: Select Case Err.Number '1 Case Else MsgBox "Unexpected Error:" _ & vbCrLf & "Error " & Err.Number & " " & Err.Description _ & " in procedure GetArrayOfCategory of VBA Document Form_test some code" _ , vbCritical, "Please Investigate" Resume ExitHere ' Resume 'For Debug Only End Select
End Function
Function GetSendKeys_Value(strName As String, strLanguage As String, stringCategory As String, stringDeliveryType As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) As String Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim StringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer StringSQLText = "SELECT Top 1 CustomIntelliSense.SendKeys_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Remarks" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.DeliveryType" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Categories.Category" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM Languages " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE (((Languages.Language)='" & strLanguage & "') " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " AND ((UPPER(CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value)) ='" & UCase (strName) & "') " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " AND ((Categories.Category)='" & stringCategory & "'))" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;" Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst ' GetSendKeys_Value = Replace(Recordset![SendKeys_Value], Chr(10), "") GetSendKeys_Value= Recordset![SendKeys_Value] Remarks = Recordset![Remarks] stringDeliveryType= Recordset![DeliveryType] Else MsgBox " cannot find command line for " & strName End If
Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing
End Function
Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Public Sub SendKeysWithCRLF(stringValue As String) Dim stringTemporary As String Dim integerPosition As Integer 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) & Chr(10)) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13)) 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(10)) If integerPosition > 0 Then stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Do
'Debug.Print stringTemporary SendKeys stringTemporary, True SendKeys "{Enter}"
stringValue = Mid(stringValue, integerPosition + 2) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) ) If integerPosition = 0 Then Exit Do stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Loop End If SendKeys stringValue 'Debug.Print stringValue End Sub

Command.name: <symbols> <In_Out>
Command.content: Sub Main Dim stringText As String Select Case ListVar1 Case "Square Brackets" stringText="[]" Case "Brackets" SendKeys "{(}" SendKeys "{)}" Case "Curly Brackets" stringText = "{{}" & "" & "}" stringText = Replace$(stringText, "{{} ", "{{}") stringText = Replace$(stringText, " }", "}") Case "Single Quotes","Apostrophes" stringText="''" Case "Quotes" stringText="""""" Case "At Signs" stringText="@@" Case "Chevrons" stringText="<>" Case "Equals" stringText="==" Case "Not Equal" stringText="!=" Case "Plus" stringText="++" Case "Dollar" stringText="$$" Case "Hash" stringText="##" Case "Question Marks" stringText=" ?? " Case "Ampersands","Double Ampersands","Double And Symbol" stringText=" && " Case "Pipes" stringText=" || " End Select SendKeys stringText,True If ListVar2="In" Then SendKeys "{Left}",True End If End Sub

Command.name: Get Ticket Name
Command.content:
Private Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, _ ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, _ ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long)
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type
'
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10
Sub Main
Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long
GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates
xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y) SetMousePosition 0,-928,269 Beep Wait 1.1 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.1 SetMousePosition 1,-1028,269
SendKeys "^c" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.1 AppBringUp "C:\Program Files (x86)\Upwork\upwork.exe" Wait 0.1 HeardWord "DISPLAY","Numbers"
End Sub

Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Dim catList(100) As String Dim IntelliSenseList(100) As String Dim Remarks As Variant Sub Main Dim strLanguage As String Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler ' MsgBox atCNames(0), vbOkOnly, "Computer Name?" ' If UtilityProvider.IsDebugMode Then ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(0,"IntelliSense") ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(1,"Text Blocks") ' End If Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString = GetConnectionString()' "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=USER-HP;Initial Catalog=MyDatabase;Integrated Security=SSPI;" Connection.Open GetArrayOfResults ListVar1,connection Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl result = EngineControl.PromptValue(catList(), "choose your item", 1400, 700) If result="Edit List" Then strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\DictationBoxMSP\VoiceLauncher\bin\Release\VoiceLauncher.exe" strCommandLine = strCommandLine & " " & Chr(34) & "/ " & "Unknown" & CHR(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & "Unknown" & Chr(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & ListVar1 & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbNormalFocus) Exit Sub End If
If result="Quit Menu" Then Exit Sub Dim strSendKeysValue As String Dim stringDeliveryType As String strSendKeysValue=GetSendKeys_Value(result, stringDeliveryType, Connection) Dim stringClipboardBackup As String stringClipboardBackup= Clipboard Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing
' MsgBox strSendKeysValue If Len(Remarks & "")>0 Then 'SendDragonKeys "'" & Remarks & vbCr & strSendKeysValue ' DragonMsg Remarks ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, Remarks End If ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage showmessageNone, "Starting Send Keys Process" Select Case stringDeliveryType Case "Copy and Paste" Clipboard strSendKeysValue Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 Clipboard stringClipboardBackup Case "Send Keys","Send Dragon Keys","Send System Keys" If InStr(strSendKeysValue,Chr(13)) = 0 Then If Len(strSendKeysValue)> 100 Then SendKeys Left (strSendKeysValue, 100), True Wait 0.1 SendKeys Mid(strSendKeysValue, 101), True Else SendKeys strSendKeysValue, True End If Else SendKeysWithCRLF strSendKeysValue End If Case "Execute as Script" 'VoiceCommand.ExecuteScript strSendKeysValue,0 Case "Clipboard Only" Clipboard strSendKeysValue End Select ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage showmessageNoBeep , "Finished Send Keys Process" ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: If Err.Number= 521 Or Err.Number= 10140 Then ' I believe this is can't access the clipboard Resume Next End If MsgBox Err.Number & " " & Err.Description,,"IntelliSense script; An Error Has Occurred " Resume ExitHere End Sub
Function GetArrayOfResults(searchTerm As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String On Error GoTo GetArrayOfCategory_Error Dim k As Integer Dim strSQLText As String strSQLText = "SELECT CustomIntelliSense.*" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value) Like '%" & searchTerm & "%')) " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 catList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Display_Value") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing k= k +1 catList(k)="Edit List"
k= k +1 catList(k)="Quit Menu" ExitHere: Exit Function
GetArrayOfCategory_Error: Select Case Err.Number '1 Case Else MsgBox "Unexpected Error:" _ & vbCrLf & "Error " & Err.Number & " " & Err.Description _ & " in procedure GetArrayOfCategory of VBA Document Form_test some code" _ , vbCritical, "Please Investigate" Resume ExitHere ' Resume 'For Debug Only End Select
End Function
Function GetSendKeys_Value(strName As String, stringDeliveryType As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) As String Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim StringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer StringSQLText = "SELECT Top 1 CustomIntelliSense.SendKeys_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Remarks" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.DeliveryType" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Categories.Category" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM Languages " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE (((CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value)='" & strName & "')) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;" Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst ' GetSendKeys_Value = Replace(Recordset![SendKeys_Value], Chr(10), "") GetSendKeys_Value= Recordset![SendKeys_Value] Remarks = Recordset![Remarks] stringDeliveryType= Recordset![DeliveryType] Else MsgBox " cannot find command line for " & strName End If
Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing
End Function
Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Public Sub SendKeysWithCRLF(stringValue As String) Dim stringTemporary As String Dim integerPosition As Integer 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) & Chr(10)) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13)) 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(10)) If integerPosition > 0 Then stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Do
'Debug.Print stringTemporary SendKeys stringTemporary, True SendKeys "{Enter}"
stringValue = Mid(stringValue, integerPosition + 2) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) ) If integerPosition = 0 Then Exit Do stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Loop End If SendKeys stringValue 'Debug.Print stringValue End Sub

Command.name: Create Custom IntelliSense
Command.content:
Sub Main
DIM backup as String backup=Clipboard SendKeys "^c" DIM value as String value=Clipboard
strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\DictationBoxMSP\VoiceLauncher\bin\Release\VoiceLauncher.exe" strCommandLine = strCommandLine & " " & Chr(34) & "/ " & "Add New" & CHR(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & value & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbNormalFocus) Clipboard (backup)
End Sub

Command.name: <screenlocation> <atoz>
Command.content:
'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Private Type POINTAPI X As Long Y As Long End Type
Private Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long
Sub Main Dim longTop As Long Dim intLeft As Long
Select Case ListVar2 Case "Zero" intLeft=5 Case "Alpha" intLeft= 50 Case "Bravo" intLeft= 100 Case "Charlie" intLeft= 150 Case "Delta" intLeft= 200 Case "Echo" intLeft= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intLeft= 300 Case "Golf" intLeft= 350 Case "Hotel" intLeft= 400 Case "India" intLeft= 450 Case "Juliet" intLeft= 500 Case "Kilo" intLeft= 550 Case "Lima" intLeft= 600 Case "Mike" intLeft= 650 Case "November" intLeft= 700 Case "Oscar" intLeft= 750 Case "Papa" intLeft= 800 Case "Qubec" intLeft= 850 Case "Romeo" intLeft= 900 Case "Sierra" intLeft= 950 Case "Tango" intLeft= 1000 Case "Uniform" intLeft= 1050 Case "Victor" intLeft= 1100 Case "Whiskey" intLeft= 1150 Case "X-ray" intLeft= 1200 Case "Yankee" intLeft= 1250 Case "Zulu" intLeft= 1300 Case "One","1" intLeft= 1350 Case "Two","2","to" intLeft= 1400 Case "Three","3" intLeft= 1450 Case "Four","4","for" intLeft= 1500 Case "Five","5" intLeft= 1550 Case "Six","6" intLeft= 1600 Case "Seven","7" intLeft= 1650 End Select Select Case ListVar1 Case "Card" longTop= 940 Case "Taskbar","Taskbar Right" longTop= 1030 Case "Title bar" longTop= 15 Case "Ribbon","Menu" longTop= 85 Case "Tab line","Document Heading" longTop= 197 Case "Horizontal Scrollbar" longTop= 987 Case "Tab Page Line" longTop= 256 Case "Menu Right" longTop= 90 intLeft= intLeft+ 1700 Case "Left LightSwitch" longTop= 977 End Select ' SetMousePosition 0,LongLeft, longTop SetMousePositionW(0, CLng (intLeft) , longTop) ' HeardWord "mouse","left","click" If ListVar1="Taskbar Right" Then ButtonClick 2,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) Else ButtonClick 1,1 End If ' SetMousePositionW(0, CLng (intLeft+1) , longTop+1) End Sub Function SetMousePositionW(integerRelative As Integer, integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer)
SetCursorPos(CLng(integerLeft),CLng(integerTop))
End Function

Command.name: Show Launcher <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Dim catList(100) As String Dim IntelliSenseList(100) As String Dim Remarks As Variant Sub Main Dim strLanguage As String Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString = GetConnectionString()' "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=USER-HP;Initial Catalog=MyDatabase;Integrated Security=SSPI;" Connection.Open GetArrayOfResults ListVar1,connection Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl result = EngineControl.PromptValue(catList(), "choose your item", 1400, 700) If result="Edit List" Then strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\DictationBoxMSP\VoiceLauncher\bin\Release\VoiceLauncher.exe" strCommandLine = strCommandLine & " " & Chr(34) & "/ " & "Launcher" & CHR(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & "Unknown" & Chr(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & ListVar1 & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbNormalFocus) Exit Sub End If
If result="Quit Menu" Then Exit Sub ' MsgBox result, vbExclamation, "Result" strCommandLine=GetLauncher_Value(result, Connection) 'MsgBox strCommandLine, vbExclamation, "Testing" Dim stringFolder as String stringFolder="C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\" strCommandLine= Replace(strCommandLine,Chr(34),"") Select Case Right(strCommandLine,3) Case "mdb", "mda", "mdw" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "cdb","cda","cdw" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "rtf", "doc", "dot" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\winword.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine) Case Else If strCommandLine="C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\ONENOTE.EXE" Then Shell strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus ElseIf strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\Cognitive-Speech-STT-Windows\samples\SpeechRecognitionServiceExample\bin\x64\Debug\SpeechToText-WPF-Sample.exe" Then Shell strCommandLine,vbNormalNoFocus ElseIf InStr(strCommandLine,"http")>0 Or InStr(strCommandLine,"www")>0 Or InStr(strCommandLine,"//")>0 Then ShellExecute strCommandLine Else AppBringUp strCommandLine End If
End Select
Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing
ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: If Err.Number= 521 Or Err.Number= 10140 Then ' I believe this is can't access the clipboard Resume Next End If MsgBox Err.Number & " " & Err.Description,,"An Error Has Occurred " & result Resume ExitHere End Sub
Function GetArrayOfResults(searchTerm As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String On Error GoTo GetArrayOfCategory_Error Dim k As Integer Dim strSQLText As String strSQLText = "SELECT Launcher.*" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Launcher " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Launcher.Name) Like '%" & searchTerm & "%')) " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ORDER BY Launcher.Name;" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 catList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Name") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing k= k +1 catList(k)="Edit List"
k= k +1 catList(k)="Quit Menu" ExitHere: Exit Function
GetArrayOfCategory_Error: Select Case Err.Number '1 Case Else MsgBox "Unexpected Error:" _ & vbCrLf & "Error " & Err.Number & " " & Err.Description _ & " in procedure GetArrayOfCategory of VBA Document Form_test some code" _ , vbCritical, "Please Investigate" Resume ExitHere ' Resume 'For Debug Only End Select
End Function
Function GetLauncher_Value(strName As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) As String Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim StringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer StringSQLText = "SELECT Top 1 Launcher.CommandLine" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM Launcher " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE (((Launcher.Name)='" & strName & "')) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ORDER BY Launcher.Name;" Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst GetLauncher_Value= Recordset![CommandLine] Else MsgBox " cannot find command line for " & strName End If
Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing
End Function

'Debug.Print stringTemporary SendKeys stringTemporary, True SendKeys "{Enter}"
stringValue = Mid(stringValue, integerPosition + 2) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) ) If integerPosition = 0 Then Exit Do stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Loop End If SendKeys stringValue 'Debug.Print stringValue End Sub

Command.name: <programminglanguage> <categories> <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Dim catList(100) As String Dim IntelliSenseList(100) As String Dim Remarks As Variant Sub Main Dim strLanguage As String Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler ' MsgBox atCNames(0), vbOkOnly, "Computer Name?" ' If UtilityProvider.IsDebugMode Then ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(0,"IntelliSense") ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(1,"Text Blocks") ' End If Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString = GetConnectionString()' "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=USER-HP;Initial Catalog=MyDatabase;Integrated Security=SSPI;" Connection.Open
strLanguage= ListVar1 Dim stringCategory As String stringCategory=ListVar2 If strLanguage="IntelliSense" Then strLanguage="Not Applicable" If strLanguage="C#" Then strLanguage="C Sharp" ' result = EngineControl.PromptValue(IntelliSenseList(), "choose your item", 1400, 700) result=ListVar3 If LCase (result) ="edit list" Then strCommandLine="C:\Msoffice\Access\DragonScripts.accdb" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) & " /cmd " & Chr(34) & strLanguage & "|" & stringCategory & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing Exit Sub End If If result="Quit Menu" Then Exit Sub Dim strSendKeysValue As String Dim stringDeliveryType As String strSendKeysValue=GetSendKeys_Value(result, strLanguage, stringCategory, stringDeliveryType, Connection) Dim stringClipboardBackup As String stringClipboardBackup= Clipboard Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing
' MsgBox strSendKeysValue If Len(Remarks & "")>0 Then 'SendDragonKeys "'" & Remarks & vbCr & strSendKeysValue ' DragonMsg Remarks ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, Remarks End If ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage showmessageNone, "Starting Send Keys Process" Select Case stringDeliveryType Case "Copy and Paste" Clipboard strSendKeysValue Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 Clipboard stringClipboardBackup Case "Send Keys","Send Dragon Keys","Send System Keys" strSendKeysValue=Replace(strSendKeysValue,"(","{(}") strSendKeysValue=Replace(strSendKeysValue,")","{)}")
If InStr(strSendKeysValue,Chr(13)) = 0 Then If Len(strSendKeysValue)> 100 Then SendKeys Left (strSendKeysValue, 100), True Wait 0.1 SendKeys Mid(strSendKeysValue, 101), True Else SendKeys strSendKeysValue, True End If Else SendKeysWithCRLF strSendKeysValue End If Case "Execute as Script" 'VoiceCommand.ExecuteScript strSendKeysValue,0 Case "Clipboard Only" Clipboard strSendKeysValue End Select ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage showmessageNoBeep , "Finished Send Keys Process" ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: If Err.Number= 521 Or Err.Number= 10140 Then ' I believe this is can't access the clipboard Resume Next End If MsgBox Err.Number & " " & Err.Description,,"IntelliSense script; An Error Has Occurred " Resume ExitHere End Sub
Function GetIntelliSenseArray(strCategory As String, strLanguage As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim stringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer stringSQLText = "SELECT CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , Computers.ComputerName" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM (Languages " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID) " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " LEFT JOIN Computers " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON CustomIntelliSense.ComputerID = Computers.ID" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE (((Languages.Language)='" & strLanguage & "') " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " AND ((Categories.Category)='" & strCategory & "') " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " AND ((Computers.ComputerName)='" & atCNames(0) & "' Or (Computers.ComputerName) Is Null))" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;"
Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst Erase IntelliSenseList() End If Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 IntelliSenseList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Display_Value") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing IntelliSenseList(k+1)="Edit List" IntelliSenseList(k+2)="Quit Menu" End Function
Function GetArrayOfCategory(strLanguage As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String On Error GoTo GetArrayOfCategory_Error Dim k As Integer Dim strSQLText As String strSQLText = "SELECT DISTINCT Categories.*" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Languages " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Categories.Category_Type)='IntelliSense Command') " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " AND ((Languages.Language)='" & strLanguage & "'))" strSQLText = strSQLText & " ORDER BY Categories.Category;" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 catList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Category")
Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing k= k +1 catList(k)="Quit Menu" ExitHere: Exit Function
GetArrayOfCategory_Error: Select Case Err.Number '1 Case Else MsgBox "Unexpected Error:" _ & vbCrLf & "Error " & Err.Number & " " & Err.Description _ & " in procedure GetArrayOfCategory of VBA Document Form_test some code" _ , vbCritical, "Please Investigate" Resume ExitHere ' Resume 'For Debug Only End Select
End Function
Function GetSendKeys_Value(strName As String, strLanguage As String, stringCategory As String, stringDeliveryType As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) As String Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim StringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer StringSQLText = "SELECT Top 1 CustomIntelliSense.SendKeys_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Remarks" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.DeliveryType" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Categories.Category" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM Languages " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE (((Languages.Language)='" & strLanguage & "') " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " AND ((CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value)='" & strName & "') " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " AND ((Categories.Category)='" & stringCategory & "'))" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;" Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst ' GetSendKeys_Value = Replace(Recordset![SendKeys_Value], Chr(10), "") GetSendKeys_Value= Recordset![SendKeys_Value] Remarks = Recordset![Remarks] stringDeliveryType= Recordset![DeliveryType] Else MsgBox " cannot find command line for " & strName End If
Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing
End Function
Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Public Sub SendKeysWithCRLF(stringValue As String) Dim stringTemporary As String Dim integerPosition As Integer 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) & Chr(10)) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13)) 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(10)) If integerPosition > 0 Then stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Do
'Debug.Print stringTemporary SendKeys stringTemporary, True SendKeys "{Enter}"
stringValue = Mid(stringValue, integerPosition + 2) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) ) If integerPosition = 0 Then Exit Do stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Loop End If SendKeys stringValue 'Debug.Print stringValue End Sub

Dim integerCounter2 as Integer For integerCounter2 = 1 to ListVar1 LRandomNumber = Int((62 - 122 + 1) * Rnd + 122) SendKeys chr$(LRandomNumber),True next Wait 0.1 End Sub

Command.name: <DiagonalDirection> <1to100>

Command.name: <scrollbar_2> <atoz_2>
Command.content:
'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type ' declare Win32 API functions Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, lpRect As RECT) As Long Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" () Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long
Sub Main Dim intTop As Long Dim LongLeft As Long
Select Case ListVar2 Case "Zero" intTop=5 Case "Alpha" intTop= 50 Case "Bravo" intTop= 100 Case "Charlie" intTop= 150 Case "Delta" intTop= 200 Case "Echo" intTop= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intTop= 300 Case "Golf" intTop= 350 Case "Hotel" intTop= 400 Case "India" intTop= 450 Case "Juliet" intTop= 500 Case "Kilo" intTop= 550 Case "Lima" intTop= 600 Case "Mike" intTop= 650 Case "November" intTop= 700 Case "Oscar" intTop= 750 Case "Papa" intTop= 800 Case "Qubec" intTop= 850 Case "Romeo" intTop= 900 Case "Sierra" intTop= 950 Case "Tango" intTop= 1000 Case "Uniform" intTop= 1050 End Select Select Case ListVar1 Case "Scrollbar","Scrollbar Left" LongLeft = 1665 Case "Collapse","Collapse Left" 'SetMousePosition 1,148,362 LongLeft=362 Case "Collapse Right" LongLeft=362+1665 Case Else LongLeft = 3350 End Select SetMousePositionWinAPI False,LongLeft, intTop ButtonClick 1,1 End Sub
Function SetMousePositionWinAPI(BooleanRelative As Boolean ,integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer) Dim hwnd As Long Dim offset As POINTAPI Dim result As POINTAPI If BooleanRelative Then hwnd = GetForegroundWindow offset.x= integerLeft offset.y= integerTop result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd,offset) Else result.x=integerLeft result.y=integerTop End If SetCursorPos(result.x, result.y) End Function Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long,pt As POINTAPI) As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect result.x = pt.x + wRect.Left result.y = pt.y + wRect.Top GetWinCurPos = result End Function

Command.name: <screen> <atoz> <atoz>
Command.content:
Public Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Public Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" Alias "mouse_event" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 ' left button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 ' left button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 ' middle button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 ' middle button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 ' right button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10 ' right button up
Private Declare Function GetSystemMetrics Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal nIndex As Long) As Long Const SM_CXSCREEN = 0 Const SM_CYSCREEN = 1 Private Const SM_CMONITORS As Long = 80 Public Type RectAPI Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Private Const SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 76 Private Const SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 77 Private Const SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 78 Private Const SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 79 Dim blnDualMonitors As Boolean Dim blnFineTune As Boolean Sub Main ' this script is primarily for the second screen and assumes resolutions as follows screen one 1680 by 1050 and screen two 1280 by 1024 (1440 times 900 is what the new screen is) ' trying to make this script also work for the following screen set up which is what it is at home 1280×1024 1280×800
Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer Dim myRect As RectAPI Dim x As Long Dim y As Long Dim lngScreen1Width As Long Dim lngScreen1Height As Long Dim lngScreen2Width As Long Dim lngScreen2Height As Long ' work out if there is a second monitor
blnDualMonitors=MultiMonitors() ' get the number of pixels across and down for the main monitor lngScreen1Width = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSCREEN) lngScreen1Height = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSCREEN) 'MsgBox "multi screens" & blnDualMonitors ' get the number of pixels across for the second screen myRect=GetVirtualDisplayRect() lngScreen2Width= myRect.Right -lngScreen1Width ' work out the height of the second screen based on the width of screens If myRect.Right=2960 Or myRect.Right= 2986 Then lngScreen2Height=1024 ElseIf myRect.Right=2560 Then lngScreen2Height=800 ElseIf myRect.Right=3120 Then lngScreen2Height=900 ElseIf myRect.Right= 3360 Then lngScreen2Height= 1050 End If 'MsgBox "screen 2 Height " & lngScreen2Height & " myRect.Riight: " & myRect.Right ' now need to put the rest into practice from here blnFineTune=False Dim columnLetter as String columnLetter= CStr(ListVar2) Dim rowLetter as String rowLetter=CStr(ListVar3) intLeft=GetScreenCoordinates(columnLetter,1) intTop=GetScreenCoordinates(rowLetter,2) Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long 'MsgBox " list of variable values are " & ListVar1 & " " & ListVar2 & " " & ListVar3 'MsgBox "fine tune " & blnFineTune If blnFineTune Then SetMousePosition 2,intLeft,intTop Else Select Case ListVar1 Case "Grid Left","Grid" ,"Arrow Click","Click","Right Click","Double Click","doubleclick","Left" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=lngScreen1Width-1 If intTop> lngScreen1Height Then intTop=lngScreen1Height-1 SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) ' Where X and Y are in pixel Case "Grid Right" ,"Screen Click" ,"Touch","Double Touch","Right Touch","Right" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width + lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=(lngScreen1Width+lngScreen1Width)-1 If intTop> lngScreen2Height Then intTop=lngScreen2Height-1 ' MsgBox "intLeft = " & intLeft & " intTop= " & intTop & " lngScreen1Width=" & lngScreen1Width SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Case "Drag","Drag Arrow" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) Wait 0.5 ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI
SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Drag Screen" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.5 SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End Select End If Wait 0.1
Select Case ListVar1 Case "Arrow Click","Click","Screen Click","Touch"
ButtonClick 1,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) Case "Double Click","Double Touch","doubleclick"
ButtonClick 1,2 Case "Right Click","Right Touch" ButtonClick 2,1 End Select
End Sub Function GetScreenCoordinates(s As String,arg As Integer) As Integer Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer If arg=1 Then Select Case s Case "Zero" intLeft=5 Case "Alpha" intLeft= 50 Case "Bravo" intLeft= 100 Case "Charlie" intLeft= 150 Case "Delta" intLeft= 200 Case "Echo" intLeft= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intLeft= 300 Case "Golf" intLeft= 350 Case "Hotel" intLeft= 400 Case "India" intLeft= 450 Case "Juliet" intLeft= 500 Case "Kilo" intLeft= 550 Case "Lima" intLeft= 600 Case "Mike" intLeft= 650 Case "November" intLeft= 700 Case "Oscar" intLeft= 750 Case "Papa" intLeft= 800 Case "Qubec" intLeft= 850 Case "Romeo" intLeft= 900 Case "Sierra" intLeft= 950 Case "Tango" intLeft= 1000 Case "Uniform" intLeft= 1050 Case "Victor" intLeft= 1100 Case "Whiskey" intLeft= 1150 Case "X-ray" intLeft= 1200 Case "Yankee" intLeft= 1250 Case "Zulu" intLeft= 1300 Case "One","1" intLeft= 1350 Case "Two" intLeft= 1400 Case "Three" intLeft= 1450 Case "Four","For" intLeft= 1500 Case "Five" intLeft= 1550 Case "Six" intLeft= 1600 Case "Seven" intLeft= 1650 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intLeft Else Select Case s Case "Zero" intTop=5 Case "Alpha" intTop= 50 Case "Bravo" intTop= 100 Case "Charlie" intTop= 150 Case "Delta" intTop= 200 Case "Echo" intTop= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intTop= 300 Case "Golf" intTop= 350 Case "Hotel" intTop= 400 Case "India" intTop= 450 Case "Juliet" intTop= 500 Case "Kilo" intTop= 550 Case "Lima" intTop= 600 Case "Mike" intTop= 650 Case "November" intTop= 700 Case "Oscar" intTop= 750 Case "Papa" intTop= 800 Case "Qubec" intTop= 850 Case "Romeo" intTop= 900 Case "Sierra" intTop= 950 Case "Tango" intTop= 1000 Case "Uniform" intTop= 1050 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intTop End If End Function
Private Function MultiMonitors() As Boolean MultiMonitors = (GetSystemMetrics(SM_CMONITORS) > 1) End Function
Public Function GetVirtualDisplayRect() As RectAPI With GetVirtualDisplayRect .Left = GetSystemMetrics(SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN) .Top = GetSystemMetrics(SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN) .Right = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Left .Bottom = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Top End With End Function

if ListVar2="One" Then numberOfWords=1 else numberOfWords=ListVar2 End If SendKeys "^+{" & ListVar1 & " " & numberOfWords & "}" End Sub

Command.name: Launcher <launcher_categories>
Command.content:
'#Reference {57D58F7A-9EB7-40AC-98FC-8E14FA414452}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dgnmycmds.dll#DgnMyCommands#DgnMyCommands '#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Dim catList(100) As String Dim appList(100) As String Sub Main Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String Dim intMenuNumber As Integer Dim strCategory As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler
strCategory=ListVar1 If strCategory="Categories" Then result="Back to Categories" End If Dim longCounter As Long Do longCounter=longCounter + 1 If result="Back to Categories" Then GetArrayOfCategory Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl strCategory = EngineControl.PromptValue(catList(), "choose your category " & longCounter, 1400, 700) End If GetlApplicationNameArray(strCategory) result = EngineControl.PromptValue(appList(), "choose " & strCategory & " " & longCounter, 1400, 700) If result="Edit List" Then strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\DictationBoxMSP\VoiceLauncher\bin\Release\VoiceLauncher.exe" strCommandLine = strCommandLine & " " & Chr(34) & "/ " & "Launcher" & CHR(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & ListVar1 & Chr(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & "Unknown" & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbNormalFocus) Exit Sub End If
If result="Quit Menu" Then Exit Sub End If
' If Not result="Back to Categories" Then Exit Do Dim integerCounter As Integer If Not result="Back to Categories" Then For integerCounter = 0 To UBound(appList) -1 If result=appList(integerCounter) Then ' TTSPlayString result Exit Do End If Next End If If longCounter> 5 Then result="" Exit Do End If Loop
If result="" Then Exit Sub strCommandLine=GetCommandLine(result) Dim stringFolder as String stringFolder="C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\" strCommandLine= Replace(strCommandLine,Chr(34),"") Select Case Right(strCommandLine,3) Case "mdb", "mda", "mdw" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "cdb","cda","cdw" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "rtf", "doc", "dot" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\winword.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine) Case Else If strCommandLine="C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\ONENOTE.EXE" Then Shell strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus ElseIf strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\Cognitive-Speech-STT-Windows\samples\SpeechRecognitionServiceExample\bin\x64\Debug\SpeechToText-WPF-Sample.exe" Then Shell strCommandLine,vbNormalNoFocus ElseIf InStr(strCommandLine,"http")>0 Or InStr(strCommandLine,"www")>0 Or InStr(strCommandLine,"//")>0 Then ShellExecute strCommandLine Else AppBringUp strCommandLine End If
End Select
'EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, "Opening: " & strCommandLine
ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: MsgBox Err.Description,," An Error Has Occurred " & Err.Number Resume ExitHere
End Sub
Function GetlApplicationNameArray(strCategory As String) Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim stringSQLText As String stringSQLText = "SELECT Launcher.Name" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM (Categories " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " INNER JOIN Launcher " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = Launcher.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " LEFT JOIN Computers " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON Launcher.ComputerID = Computers.ID" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE (((Categories.Category)='" & strCategory & "') " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " AND ((Computers.ComputerName)='" & atCNames(0) & "')) " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " OR (((Categories.Category)='" & strCategory & "') " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " AND ((Computers.ComputerName) Is Null))" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ORDER BY Launcher.Name;"
Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Dim k As Integer
Erase appList() Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 appList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Name") If Mid(appList(k),2,1)="." Then appList(k)= Trim(Mid(appList(k),3)) End If
'rs![Menu] = 0
Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close k=k +1 appList(k)="Edit List" k=k+1 appList(k)="Back to Categories" k=k+1 appList(k)="Quit Menu"
End Function
Function GetArrayOfCategory() Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim k As Integer Dim strSQLText As String
strSQLText = "SELECT Categories.ID" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " , Categories.Category" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Categories where Categories.Category_type='Launch Applications';" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 catList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Category") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close k= k +1 catList(k)="Quit Menu" End Function
Function GetCategoryfromNumber(intMenuNumber As Integer)As String Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open
Dim strSQLText As String Dim k As Integer
strSQLText = "SELECT TOP 1 Categories.Category" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Categories" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Categories.ID) = " & intMenuNumber & "));" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst GetCategoryfromNumber= (Recordset![Category]) Else MsgBox " cannot find Category for " & intMenuNumber End If
Recordset.Close
End Function
Function GetCommandLine(strName As String) As String Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open
Dim strSQLText As String Dim k As Integer strSQLText = "SELECT TOP 1 Launcher.CommandLine" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Launcher" & vbCrLf ' strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Launcher.Name) Like '*" & strName & "'));" strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Launcher.Name) = '" & strName & "'));" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst GetCommandLine= Recordset![CommandLine] Else MsgBox " cannot find command line for " & strName End If
Recordset.Close
End Function Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function

Sub Main
strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\DictationBoxMSP\VoiceLauncher\bin\Release\VoiceLauncher.exe" strCommandLine = strCommandLine & " " & Chr(34) & "/ " & "Todos" & CHR(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & ListVar1 & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbNormalFocus)
