Command.name: <programminglanguage> <categories>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Dim catList(100) As String Dim IntelliSenseList(1000) As String Dim Remarks As Variant Sub Main Dim strLanguage As String Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler ' MsgBox atCNames(0), vbOkOnly, "Computer Name?" ' If UtilityProvider.IsDebugMode Then ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(0,"IntelliSense") ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(1,"Text Blocks") ' End If Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString = GetConnectionString()' "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=USER-HP;Initial Catalog=MyDatabase;Integrated Security=SSPI;" Connection.Open
strLanguage= ListVar1 Dim stringCategory As String stringCategory=ListVar2 If strLanguage="IntelliSense" Then strLanguage="Not Applicable" If strLanguage="C#" Then strLanguage="C Sharp" Do 'used this statement to refer to the first list argument If stringCategory ="Categories" Or result ="Show Categories" Then GetArrayOfCategory strLanguage, Connection ' ExecuteScript "SetRecognitionMode 2",0 ' CommandModeOn Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl
result = EngineControl.PromptValue(catList(), "choose your category", 1400, 700) ' ExecuteScript "SetRecognitionMode 0",0 ' NormalModeOn
If result="Quit Menu" Then Exit Sub stringCategory= result GetIntelliSenseArray(result, strLanguage, Connection) Else GetIntelliSenseArray(stringCategory, strLanguage, Connection) End If
' ExecuteScript "SetRecognitionMode 2",0 ' CommandModeOn result = EngineControl.PromptValue(IntelliSenseList(), "choose your item", 1400, 700) ' ExecuteScript "SetRecognitionMode 0",0 ' NormalModeOn If result="Edit List" Then strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\DictationBoxMSP\VoiceLauncher\bin\Release\VoiceLauncher.exe" strCommandLine = strCommandLine & " " & Chr(34) & "/ " & strLanguage & CHR(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & stringCategory & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbNormalFocus)
Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing Exit Sub End If If result="Quit Menu" Then End If Not result="Show Categories" Then Exit Do End If Loop Dim strSendKeysValue As String Dim stringDeliveryType As String strSendKeysValue=GetSendKeys_Value(result, strLanguage, stringCategory, stringDeliveryType, Connection) Dim stringClipboardBackup As String stringClipboardBackup= Clipboard Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing
' MsgBox strSendKeysValue If Len(Remarks & "")>0 Then 'SendDragonKeys "'" & Remarks & vbCr & strSendKeysValue ' DragonMsg Remarks ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, Remarks End If ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage showmessageNone, "Starting Send Keys Process" Select Case stringDeliveryType Case "Copy and Paste" Clipboard strSendKeysValue Wait 0.4 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 Clipboard stringClipboardBackup Case "Send Keys","Send Dragon Keys","Send System Keys" strSendKeysValue=Replace(strSendKeysValue,"(","{(}") strSendKeysValue=Replace(strSendKeysValue,")","{)}") If InStr(strSendKeysValue,Chr(13)) = 0 Then If Len(strSendKeysValue)> 100 Then SendKeys Left (strSendKeysValue, 100), True Wait 0.1 SendKeys Mid(strSendKeysValue, 101), True Else SendKeys strSendKeysValue, True End If Else SendKeysWithCRLF strSendKeysValue End If Case "Execute as Script" 'VoiceCommand.ExecuteScript strSendKeysValue,0 Case "Clipboard Only" Clipboard strSendKeysValue End Select ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage showmessageNoBeep , "Finished Send Keys Process" ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: If Err.Number= 521 Or Err.Number= 10140 Then ' I believe this is can't access the clipboard Resume Next End If MsgBox strSendKeysValue & " " & Err.Number & " " & Err.Description,,"IntelliSense script; An Error Has Occurred " Resume ExitHere End Sub
Function GetIntelliSenseArray(strCategory As String, strLanguage As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim stringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer stringSQLText = "SELECT CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , Computers.ComputerName" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM (Languages " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID) " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " LEFT JOIN Computers " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON CustomIntelliSense.ComputerID = Computers.ID" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE (((Languages.Language)='" & strLanguage & "') " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " AND ((Categories.Category)='" & strCategory & "') " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " AND ((Computers.ComputerName)='" & atCNames(0) & "' Or (Computers.ComputerName) Is Null))" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;"
Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst Erase IntelliSenseList() End If Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 IntelliSenseList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Display_Value") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing IntelliSenseList(k+1)="Edit List" IntelliSenseList(k+2)="Quit Menu" End Function
Function GetArrayOfCategory(strLanguage As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String On Error GoTo GetArrayOfCategory_Error Dim k As Integer Dim strSQLText As String strSQLText = "SELECT DISTINCT Categories.*" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Languages " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Categories.Category_Type)='IntelliSense Command') " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " AND ((Languages.Language)='" & strLanguage & "'))" strSQLText = strSQLText & " ORDER BY Categories.Category;" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 catList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Category")
Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing k= k +1 catList(k)="Quit Menu" ExitHere: Exit Function
GetArrayOfCategory_Error: Select Case Err.Number '1 Case Else MsgBox "Unexpected Error:" _ & vbCrLf & "Error " & Err.Number & " " & Err.Description _ & " in procedure GetArrayOfCategory of VBA Document Form_test some code" _ , vbCritical, "Please Investigate" Resume ExitHere ' Resume 'For Debug Only End Select
End Function
Function GetSendKeys_Value(strName As String, strLanguage As String, stringCategory As String, stringDeliveryType As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) As String Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim StringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer StringSQLText = "SELECT Top 1 CustomIntelliSense.SendKeys_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Remarks" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.DeliveryType" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Categories.Category" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM Languages " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE (((Languages.Language)='" & strLanguage & "') " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " AND ((CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value)='" & strName & "') " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " AND ((Categories.Category)='" & stringCategory & "'))" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;" Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst ' GetSendKeys_Value = Replace(Recordset![SendKeys_Value], Chr(10), "") GetSendKeys_Value= Recordset![SendKeys_Value] Remarks = Recordset![Remarks] stringDeliveryType= Recordset![DeliveryType] Else MsgBox " cannot find command line for " & strName End If
Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing
End Function
Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Public Sub SendKeysWithCRLF(stringValue As String) Dim stringTemporary As String Dim integerPosition As Integer 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) & Chr(10)) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13)) 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(10)) If integerPosition > 0 Then stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Do
'Debug.Print stringTemporary SendKeys stringTemporary, True SendKeys "{Enter}"
stringValue = Mid(stringValue, integerPosition + 2) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) ) If integerPosition = 0 Then Exit Do stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Loop End If SendKeys stringValue 'Debug.Print stringValue End Sub

Command.name: Go To Mouse Position
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Option Explicit Private Type cursorinformation x As Integer y As Integer End Type Dim cursorinformation As cursorinformation Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Function SetMousePositionW(integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer) SetCursorPos CLng(integerLeft), CLng(integerTop)
End Function
Sub Main()
Dim stringSQLText As String
GetSavedMousePosition ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, "X: " & cursorinformation.x & " Y: " & cursorinformation.y
SetMousePositionW cursorinformation.x, cursorinformation.y
End Sub Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Function GetSavedMousePosition() Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim stringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer stringSQLText = "SELECT [SavedMousePosition].NamedLocation" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].X" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].Y" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM [SavedMousePosition]" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE ((([SavedMousePosition].NamedLocation)='Default'));" Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst cursorinformation.x = Recordset![x] cursorinformation.y = Recordset![y] End If Recordset.Close
End Function

Command.name: Go To Mouse Position <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" ' Option Explicit Private Type cursorinformation x As Integer y As Integer End Type Dim cursorinformation As cursorinformation Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long
Sub Main()
Dim stringSQLText As String
Dim namedLocation as String namedLocation=ListVar1 GetSavedMousePosition namedLocation SetMousePositionW cursorinformation.x, cursorinformation.y
End Sub
Function SetMousePositionW(integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer) SetCursorPos CLng(integerLeft), CLng(integerTop)
End Function
Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Function GetSavedMousePosition(namedLocation as String) Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim stringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer stringSQLText = "SELECT [SavedMousePosition].NamedLocation" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].X" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].Y" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM [SavedMousePosition]" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE ((([SavedMousePosition].NamedLocation)='" & namedLocation & "'))" stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ORDER BY [SavedMousePosition].Created Desc" Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst cursorinformation.x = Recordset![x] cursorinformation.y = Recordset![y] End If Recordset.Close
End Function

Command.name: Upper <myalphabet> <myalphabet>
Command.content: Sub Main t1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) t2 = Mid$(ListVar2,1,InStr(ListVar2, "\")-1) if t1 = "backslash" Then t1 = "\" if t2 = "backslash" Then t2 = "\" if t1 = "space" Then t1 = " " if t2 = "space" Then t2 = " " SendKeys UCase(t1+t2) End Sub

Command.name: <atoz> <atoz>
Command.content:
Public Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Public Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" Alias "mouse_event" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 ' left button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 ' left button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 ' middle button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 ' middle button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 ' right button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10 ' right button up
Private Declare Function GetSystemMetrics Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal nIndex As Long) As Long Const SM_CXSCREEN = 0 Const SM_CYSCREEN = 1 Private Const SM_CMONITORS As Long = 80 Public Type RectAPI Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Private Const SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 76 Private Const SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 77 Private Const SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 78 Private Const SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 79 Dim blnDualMonitors As Boolean Dim blnFineTune As Boolean Sub Main ' this script is primarily for the second screen and assumes resolutions as follows screen one 1680 by 1050 and screen two 1280 by 1024 (1440 times 900 is what the new screen is) ' trying to make this script also work for the following screen set up which is what it is at home 1280×1024 1280×800
Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer Dim myRect As RectAPI Dim x As Long Dim y As Long Dim lngScreen1Width As Long Dim lngScreen1Height As Long Dim lngScreen2Width As Long Dim lngScreen2Height As Long ' work out if there is a second monitor
blnDualMonitors=MultiMonitors() ' get the number of pixels across and down for the main monitor lngScreen1Width = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSCREEN) lngScreen1Height = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSCREEN) 'MsgBox "multi screens" & blnDualMonitors ' get the number of pixels across for the second screen myRect=GetVirtualDisplayRect() lngScreen2Width= myRect.Right -lngScreen1Width ' work out the height of the second screen based on the width of screens If myRect.Right=2960 Or myRect.Right= 2986 Then lngScreen2Height=1024 ElseIf myRect.Right=2560 Then lngScreen2Height=800 ElseIf myRect.Right=3120 Then lngScreen2Height=900 ElseIf myRect.Right= 3360 Then lngScreen2Height= 1050 End If 'MsgBox "screen 2 Height " & lngScreen2Height & " myRect.Riight: " & myRect.Right ' now need to put the rest into practice from here blnFineTune=False Dim columnLetter as String columnLetter= CStr(ListVar1) Dim rowLetter as String rowLetter=CStr(ListVar2) intLeft=GetScreenCoordinates(columnLetter,1) intTop=GetScreenCoordinates(rowLetter,2) Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long 'MsgBox " list of variable values are " & ListVar1 & " " & ListVar2 & " " & ListVar3 'MsgBox "fine tune " & blnFineTune If blnFineTune Then SetMousePosition 2,intLeft,intTop Else Dim button as String button="Click" Select Case button Case "Grid Left","Grid" ,"Arrow Click","Click","Right Click","Double Click","doubleclick","Left" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=lngScreen1Width-1 If intTop> lngScreen1Height Then intTop=lngScreen1Height-1 SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) ' Where X and Y are in pixel Case "Grid Right" ,"Screen Click" ,"Touch","Double Touch","Right Touch","Right" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width + lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=(lngScreen1Width+lngScreen1Width)-1 If intTop> lngScreen2Height Then intTop=lngScreen2Height-1 ' MsgBox "intLeft = " & intLeft & " intTop= " & intTop & " lngScreen1Width=" & lngScreen1Width SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Case "Drag","Drag Arrow" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) Wait 0.5 ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI
SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Drag Screen" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.5 SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End Select End If Wait 0.1
Select Case button Case "Arrow Click","Click","Screen Click","Touch"
ButtonClick 1,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) Case "Double Click","Double Touch","doubleclick"
ButtonClick 1,2 Case "Right Click","Right Touch" ButtonClick 2,1 End Select
End Sub Function GetScreenCoordinates(s As String,arg As Integer) As Integer Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer If arg=1 Then Select Case s Case "Zero" intLeft=5 Case "Alpha" intLeft= 50 Case "Bravo" intLeft= 100 Case "Charlie" intLeft= 150 Case "Delta" intLeft= 200 Case "Echo" intLeft= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intLeft= 300 Case "Golf" intLeft= 350 Case "Hotel" intLeft= 400 Case "India" intLeft= 450 Case "Juliet" intLeft= 500 Case "Kilo" intLeft= 550 Case "Lima" intLeft= 600 Case "Mike" intLeft= 650 Case "November" intLeft= 700 Case "Oscar" intLeft= 750 Case "Papa" intLeft= 800 Case "Qubec" intLeft= 850 Case "Romeo" intLeft= 900 Case "Sierra" intLeft= 950 Case "Tango" intLeft= 1000 Case "Uniform" intLeft= 1050 Case "Victor" intLeft= 1100 Case "Whiskey" intLeft= 1150 Case "X-ray" intLeft= 1200 Case "Yankee" intLeft= 1250 Case "Zulu" intLeft= 1300 Case "One","1" intLeft= 1350 Case "Two" intLeft= 1400 Case "Three" intLeft= 1450 Case "Four","For" intLeft= 1500 Case "Five" intLeft= 1550 Case "Six" intLeft= 1600 Case "Seven" intLeft= 1650 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intLeft Else Select Case s Case "Zero" intTop=5 Case "Alpha" intTop= 50 Case "Bravo" intTop= 100 Case "Charlie" intTop= 150 Case "Delta" intTop= 200 Case "Echo" intTop= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intTop= 300 Case "Golf" intTop= 350 Case "Hotel" intTop= 400 Case "India" intTop= 450 Case "Juliet" intTop= 500 Case "Kilo" intTop= 550 Case "Lima" intTop= 600 Case "Mike" intTop= 650 Case "November" intTop= 700 Case "Oscar" intTop= 750 Case "Papa" intTop= 800 Case "Qubec" intTop= 850 Case "Romeo" intTop= 900 Case "Sierra" intTop= 950 Case "Tango" intTop= 1000 Case "Uniform" intTop= 1050 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intTop End If End Function
Private Function MultiMonitors() As Boolean MultiMonitors = (GetSystemMetrics(SM_CMONITORS) > 1) End Function
Public Function GetVirtualDisplayRect() As RectAPI With GetVirtualDisplayRect .Left = GetSystemMetrics(SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN) .Top = GetSystemMetrics(SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN) .Right = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Left .Bottom = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Top End With End Function

Command.name: Hashtag <dictation>
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim words() As String Dim dictation As String dictation=ListVar1 words=Split(dictation," ") Dim k As Integer Dim result As String For k = 0 To UBound(words) result=result & UCase(Left(words(k),1)) & Mid(words(k),2) Next SendKeys "#" & result
End Sub

Command.name: Search For <dictation>
Command.content:
' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the control key Const VK_CTRL = &h11
Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys"f" Wait 0.1 keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Play <dictation>
Command.description: Used to force dictation into any field you can type in and adds a extra space after your dication
Command.content:
' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the control key Const VK_CTRL = &h11
Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys"f" Wait 0.1 keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "+{Tab}" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "{Home}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Copy To <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Access" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Excel" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Google Chrome" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Front Page" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Firfox" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Internet Explorer" If ListVar1 = "IE 7" Then AppSwapWith "IEXPLORE" If ListVar1 = "NaturallySpeaking" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Next Window" Then SendKeys "%{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "Start","Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Onenote" If ListVar1 = "Other Window" Then SendKeys "%{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Paint" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft PowerPoint" If ListVar1 = "Previous Window" Then SendKeys "+{Alt+Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "QuickBooks" Then HeardWord "switch","to","QuickBooks" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","WordPerfect" Wait 2 SendKeys "^v Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Delete Everything Before <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%e" Wait .2 SendKeys "f" Wait .5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Left}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^+{Home}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Add <Punctuation> After <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%e" Wait .2 SendKeys "f" Wait .5 SendKeys ListVar2 Wait .2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait .3 SendKeys "{Right}" Wait .1 SendKeys ""+ListVar1+"" Wait .3 SendKeys "^{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Find <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%e" Wait .2 SendKeys "f" Wait .5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .2 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Add Single Quotes to <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%e" Wait .2 SendKeys "f" Wait .5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .2 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait .5 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{'}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{'}" Wait .3 SendKeys "^{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Add Quotes to <dictation>

Command.name: Open in New Tab <0to500>

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^+ " Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.2 SendKeys ":t" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Enter}" ' for more info please see https://github.com/mdbridge/click-by-voice/blob/master/doc/activation_commands.md End Sub

Command.name: Get Webpage in Clipboard
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.3 Dim longCounter as Long Do on error resume next longCounter=longCounter + 1 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 if Err.Number=0 then exit do MsgBox Err.Description , vbExclamation, "Error " & Err.Number if longCounter> 100 then exit do Loop Dim stringAddress As String stringAddress= Clipboard$() wait 0.2 if Len(stringAddress)=0 then MsgBox stringAddress, vbExclamation, "Aborting" exit sub end if ' stringAddress="https://localhost:44312/SampleRequests/Create?productId=68" Dim stringControllerName As String Dim LocationOfForwardSlash As Integer stringAddress=Mid(stringAddress,23) LocationOfForwardSlash=InStr(stringAddress,"/") Dim action as string If LocationOfForwardSlash>0 Then stringControllerName=Mid(stringAddress, LocationOfForwardSlash +1) stringControllerName= Left(stringControllerName,InStr(stringControllerName ,"/" ) -1) action=Mid(stringAddress,InStr(stringAddress,stringControllerName)+ Len(stringControllerName)+1) If InStr(action,"/")>0 Then action = Left(action,InStr(action,"/")-1) If InStr(action,"?")>0 Then action = Left(action,InStr(action,"?")-1) on error resume next Clipboard stringControllerName & " " & action on error goto 0 ' InputBox ( "Controller:" & stringControllerName & vbcrlf & vbcrlf & "Action:" & action, "Testing",stringControllerName & " " & action) End If End Sub

Command.name: <Direction> <1to1000>
Command.content: Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys"{Left 50}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys"{Right 50}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys"{Up 50}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys"{Down 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" End If End Sub

Command.name: Touch Top File
Command.content:
Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Sub Main
SetMousePositionW 1,405,225 Wait 0.2 ButtonClick 1, 1 End Sub
Function SetMousePositionW(integerRelative As Integer, integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer) SetCursorPos(CLng(integerLeft),CLng(integerTop))
End Function

Command.name: Hypertext Tag <htmltags>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt"
Sub Main Dim stringTag As String stringTag=GetHtmlTag(ListVar1 ) Select Case LCase (stringTag) Case "input" SendKeys "<" & stringTag & " />{Left " & 3 & "}" Case Else SendKeys "<" & stringTag & "></" & stringTag & ">{Left " & 4 + Len(stringTag) & "}" End Select End Sub
Function GetHtmlTag(strName As String) As String Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open
Dim strSQLText As String Dim k As Integer strSQLText = "SELECT [ListValue] FROM [dbo].[HtmlTags] WHERE dbo.HtmlTags.SpokenForm='" & strName & "'" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst GetHtmlTag =Recordset![ListValue] Else MsgBox " cannot find HTML TAG for " & strName End If
Recordset.Close
End Function

Command.name: <GoTo> <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Sub Main Dim integerLine As Integer ' MsgBox ListVar1 , vbInformation, "Testing" If Val(Trim(ListVar2) ) >0 Then on error resume next integerLine=CInt(Trim(ListVar2 )) on error goto 0 Else If Trim(LCase(ListVar2)) ="for" Then integerLine=4 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="to" Then integerLine=2 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="one" Then integerLine=1 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="two" Then integerLine=2 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="three" Then integerLine=3 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="four" Then integerLine=4 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="five" Then integerLine=5 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="six" Then integerLine=6 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="seven" Then integerLine=7 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="eight" Then integerLine=8 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="nine" Then integerLine=9 ElseIf TRIM(LCase(ListVar2))="2 to 2" Then integerLine=222 ElseIf TRIM(LCase(ListVar2))="two to two" Then integerLine=222 end if End If if integerLine>0 Then
SendKeys "^g" Wait 0.1 SendKeys CStr(integerLine) Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Enter}" end if
End Sub

SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar2 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%pf" SendKeys "%d" if ListVar1="Next" Or ListVar1="Following" Then SendKeys "d" else SendKeys "u" end if SendKeys "%n" SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Remove Attachment
Command.content:
Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long '--- Hardware key constants And functions --- Public Const KEYEVENTF_KEYDOWN As Integer = &H0 Public Const KEYEVENTF_KEYPRESS As Integer = &H1 Public Const KEYEVENTF_KEYUP As Integer = &H2 Public Const KEYEVENTF_SILENT As Integer = &H4
Public Const VK_LBUTTON As Integer = &H1 '---Left mouse button Public Const VK_RBUTTON As Integer = &H2 '---Right mouse button Public Const VK_CANCEL As Integer = &H3 '---Control-break processing Public Const VK_MBUTTON As Integer = &H4 '---Middle mouse button On a three-button mouse Public Const VK_BACK As Integer = &H8 '---BACKSPACE key Public Const VK_TAB As Integer = &H9 '---TAB key Public Const VK_CLEAR As Integer = &HC '---CLEAR key Public Const VK_RETURN As Integer = &HD '---ENTER key Public Const VK_SHIFT As Integer = &H10 '---SHIFT key Public Const VK_CONTROL As Integer = &H11 '---CTRL key Public Const VK_MENU As Integer = &H12 '---ALT key Public Const VK_PAUSE As Integer = &H13 '---PAUSE key Public Const VK_CAPITAL As Integer = &H14 '---CAPS LOCK key Public Const VK_ESCAPE As Integer = &H1B '---ESC key Public Const VK_SPACE As Integer = &H20 '---SPACEBAR Public Const VK_PRIOR As Integer = &H21 '---PAGE UP key Public Const VK_NEXT As Integer = &H22 '---PAGE DOWN key Public Const VK_END As Integer = &H23 '---END key Public Const VK_HOME As Integer = &H24 '---HOME key Public Const VK_LEFT As Integer = &H25 '---LEFT ARROW key Public Const VK_UP As Integer = &H26 '---UP ARROW key Public Const VK_RIGHT As Integer = &H27 '---RIGHT ARROW key Public Const VK_DOWN As Integer = &H28 '---DOWN ARROW key Public Const VK_SELECT As Integer = &H29 '---SELECT key Public Const VK_EXECUTE As Integer = &H2B '---EXECUTE key Public Const VK_SNAPSHOT As Integer = &H2C '---PRINT SCREEN key Public Const VK_INSERT As Integer = &H2D '---INS key Public Const VK_DELETE As Integer = &H2E '---DEL key Public Const VK_HELP As Integer = &H2F '---HELP key Public Const VK_LWIN As Integer = &H5B '---Left Windows key on a Microsoft Naturalkeyboard Public Const VK_RWIN As Integer = &H5C '---Right Windows key on a Microsoft Natural keyboard Public Const VK_APPS As Integer = &H5D '---Applications key on a Microsoft Natural keyboard Public Const VK_NUMPAD0 As Integer = &H60 '---Numeric keypad 0 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD1 As Integer = &H61 '---Numeric keypad 1 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD2 As Integer = &H62 '---Numeric keypad 2 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD3 As Integer = &H63 '---Numeric keypad 3 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD4 As Integer = &H64 '---Numeric keypad 4 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD5 As Integer = &H65 '---Numeric keypad 5 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD6 As Integer = &H66 '---Numeric keypad 6 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD7 As Integer = &H67 '---Numeric keypad 7 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD8 As Integer = &H68 '---Numeric keypad 8 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD9 As Integer = &H69 '---Numeric keypad 9 key Public Const VK_MULTIPLY As Integer = &H6A '---Multiply key
Sub Main keybd_event(VK_APPS,0,KEYEVENTF_KEYDOWN ,0) Wait 0.1 keybd_event(VK_APPS,0,KEYEVENTF_KEYUP ,0) ' SendKeys "+{F10}" SendKeys "m" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%r" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%a"
End Sub

Command.name: <1to20> Set As <1to20>
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim leftPosition as long Dim down as Long leftPosition=1410 down=430 Select Case ListVar1 Case "1" SetMousePosition 1,leftPosition,down Case "2" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 70 Case "3" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 140 Case "4" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 210 Case "5" down=down+ 70 Case "6" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 70 down=down+ 70 Case "7" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 140 down=down+ 70 Case "8" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 210 down=down+ 70 End Select SetMousePosition 1,leftPosition,down Wait 0.1 ButtonClick 1,2 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^" & ListVar2
End Sub

Command.name: <1to20> Add To <1to20>
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim leftPosition as long Dim down as Long leftPosition=1410 down=430 Select Case ListVar1 Case "1" SetMousePosition 1,leftPosition,down Case "2" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 70 Case "3" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 140 Case "4" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 210 Case "5" down=down+ 70 Case "6" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 70 down=down+ 70 Case "7" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 140 down=down+ 70 Case "8" LeftPosition=LeftPosition+ 210 down=down+ 70 End Select SetMousePosition 1,leftPosition,down Wait 0.1 ButtonClick 1,2 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "+" & ListVar2 SendKeys "^" & ListVar2
End Sub

End Sub

End Sub

Sub Main Select Case ListVar1 Case "1" SendKeys "{F1}" SendKeys "{F1}" Case "2" SendKeys "{F2}" SendKeys "{F2}" Case "3" SendKeys "{F3}" SendKeys "{F3}" Case "4" SendKeys "{F4}" SendKeys "{F4}" Case "5" SendKeys "{F5}" SendKeys "{F5}" Case "6" SendKeys "{F6}" SendKeys "{F6}" Case "7" SendKeys "{F7}" SendKeys "{F7}" Case "8" SendKeys "{F8}" SendKeys "{F8}" Case "9" SendKeys "{F9}" SendKeys "{F9}" Case "10" SendKeys "{F10}" SendKeys "{F10}" Case "11" SendKeys "{F11}" SendKeys "{F11}" Case "12" SendKeys "{F12}" SendKeys "{F12}" End Select
End Sub
